-# Project-independent part of the GNU makefile system for A2L-related build targets.
-
-# Extend list of phony targets by any targets defined in this phase.
-.PHONY : ADDRESS_OVERLAP_CHECK PROCESSED_OEM_A2L MAKE_CATALOG_OF_PREBUILT_INTERNAL_A2L_SLAVE_FILES
-
-A2L_ADAPT_DEM                       := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\adapt_dem_a2l.pl
-A2L_MEASUREMENT_TIME_SLICES_UPDATER := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\modify_A2L_measurementTimeSlices.pl
-ADD_MAX_REFRESH_TAGS                := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\add_MAX_REFRESH_tags.pl
-ADJUST_A2L_ARRAY_INDEX_NOTATION     := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\adjustArrayIndexNotation.pl
-APPLY_A2L_BLACKLIST_OR_WHITELIST    := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\apply_A2L_blacklistOrWhitelist.pl
-ASAP2_MACRO_GENERATOR_SCRIPT        := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\generate_ASAP2_macros.pl
-CHECK_A2L_FILE_ENCODINGS            := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\check_A2L_fileEncoding.pl
-CHECK_ADDRESS_OVERLAP_SCRIPT        := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\checkAddressOverlap.pl
-CORRECT_FUNCTION_MAPPINGS           := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\remapCalibratableObjectsToFunctions.pl
-CREATE_DEM_EVENT_A2L                := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\create_DEM_event_A2L.pl
-MERGE_A2L_FILES                     := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\Vector_ASAP2\\mergeFiles.pl
-NUMERIC_DEM_IDS_TO_SYMBOLIC_DEM_IDS := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\
umeric_DEM_IDs_toSymbolic_DEM_IDs.pl
-PARSE_A2L_COMMENTS_FROM_SOURCES     := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\Vector_ASAP2\\parse_A2L_commentsFromSources.pl
-REFORMAT_A2L                        := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\Vector_ASAP2\\reformatFile.pl
-REMOVE_ITEMS_WITH_INVALID_ADDRESSES := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\removeItemsWithInvalidAddress.pl
-REMOVE_PRODUCTION_DATA              := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\removeProductionData.pl
-SUBST_SYMBOLS_IN_A2L_MASTER_TPL     := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\substituteSymbolicConstantsInMaster_A2L_template.pl
-UPDATE_A2L_FILE                     := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\Vector_ASAP2\\updateFile.pl
-UPDATE_OEM_A2L_FILES                := $(BUILD_TOOLS)\\a2l\\update_OEM_A2L_files.pl
-
-## @todo Can we do something about these hard-coded files? There is at least one pilot project that
-## is currently evaluating a different AUTOSAR stack implementation (i.e. not Elektrobit Tresos
-## Studio), and I recall they had to hack this stuff in order to get their build to run at all.
-A2L_DEM_ERR_ID_HEADER := $(VECTOR_GENERATED_DIR)\\include\\Dem_Lcfg.h
-A2L_DEM_EVT_ID_HEADER := $(VECTOR_GENERATED_DIR)\\include\\Dem_Lcfg.h
-
-include $(MAIN_A2L_DEFS_ROOT)\\A2L_files.inc
-
-# Creates the final customer delivery A2L file. Well, the semi-final customer A2L file, anyway,
-# because it is possible that the project-specific final_delivery_files target will create
-# additional customer-delivery A2L files based on this file.
-$(FINAL_A2L) : $(SW_TEST_A2L)
-ifeq ($(strip $(A2L_DELIVERY_ITEM_EXCLUSION_LIST_OPT)),)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Not removing non-whitelisted items from A2L, as this is either not a release-candidate build or no whitelist / blacklist exists."
-
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(COPY_ARTEFACT)" SW_TEST_A2L FINAL_A2L "$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" \\
-\t"$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)"
-else
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Removing blacklisted / non-whitelisted items from (semi-)final customer delivery A2L."
-
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(APPLY_A2L_BLACKLIST_OR_WHITELIST)" SW_TEST_A2L FINAL_A2L "$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" \\
-\t"$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" "$(A2L_DELIVERY_ITEM_EXCLUSION_LIST_FILE)" \\
-\t--includeMeasurements $(A2L_DELIVERY_ITEM_EXCLUSION_LIST_OPT) \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L))
-
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(REFORMAT_A2L)" "$(VECTOR_ASAP2_CONFIG)" MASTER_A2L_FILE SW_TEST_A2L FINAL_A2L \\
-\t"$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" "$(MK_TEMP_DIR)/final_A2L" \\
-\t"$(ASAP2_CHECKER)" \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L)) \\
-\t$(if $(TREAT_VECTOR_CORRECTNESS_VIOLATIONS_LENIENTLY),--onlyWarn)
-endif
-
-# This is the A2L file that is used by automatic smoke tests (Jenkins). We\'re essentially just
-# reformatting $(A2L_WITHOUT_PROD_DATA) to ensure that all tools used in the company can handle
-# the A2L.
-$(SW_TEST_A2L) : $(A2L_WITHOUT_PROD_DATA) $(REFORMAT_A2L)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Creating smoke test A2L (based on A2L without production data)."
-
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(REFORMAT_A2L)" "$(VECTOR_ASAP2_CONFIG)" MASTER_A2L_FILE A2L_WITHOUT_PROD_DATA \\
-\tSW_TEST_A2L "$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" \\
-\t"$(MK_TEMP_DIR)/smoketest_A2L" "$(ASAP2_CHECKER)" \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L)) \\
-\t$(if $(TREAT_VECTOR_CORRECTNESS_VIOLATIONS_LENIENTLY),--onlyWarn)
-
-# Target to remove any production data and add MAX_REFRESH tags to all RAM parameters.
-$(A2L_WITHOUT_PROD_DATA) : $(CORRECTED_A2L) $(REMOVE_PRODUCTION_DATA)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Making A2L without production data and with MAX_REFRESH tags."
-
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(REMOVE_PRODUCTION_DATA)" CORRECTED_A2L A2L_WITHOUT_PROD_DATA \\
-\tCALIBRATION_PARAM_INFO "$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L))
-
-ifdef APPLY_FUNCTION_REMAPPING
-# If the correct-function-mappings feature is enabled (i.e. if the Variables-to-Functions-Mapping.csv
-# file exists), this creates an A2L file in which all objects have been remapped to the FUNCTION
-# items stated in Variables-to-Functions-Mapping.csv. Otherwise this simply creates a copy of the
-# $(A2L_WITH_MAX_REFRESH_TAGS) file.
-$(A2L_WITH_FUNCTION_REMAPPING) : $(A2L_WITH_MAX_REFRESH_TAGS) $(VARIABLES_TO_FUNCTIONS_MAP) \\
-$(CORRECT_FUNCTION_MAPPINGS)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Correcting function mappings in A2L."
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(CORRECT_FUNCTION_MAPPINGS)" A2L_WITH_MAX_REFRESH_TAGS A2L_WITH_FUNCTION_REMAPPING \\
-\t"$(VARIABLES_TO_FUNCTIONS_MAP)" "$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L))
-else
-$(A2L_WITH_FUNCTION_REMAPPING) : $(A2L_WITH_MAX_REFRESH_TAGS)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Correct-function-mappings feature for A2L not enabled."
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(COPY_ARTEFACT)" A2L_WITH_MAX_REFRESH_TAGS A2L_WITH_FUNCTION_REMAPPING \\
-\t"$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)"
-endif
-
-$(CORRECTED_A2L) : $(A2L_WITH_FUNCTION_REMAPPING) $(REFORMAT_A2L) $(MASTER_A2L_FILE)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Running Vector ASAP2Checker for generated A2L / auto-correcting problems."
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(REFORMAT_A2L)" "$(VECTOR_ASAP2_CONFIG)" MASTER_A2L_FILE A2L_WITH_FUNCTION_REMAPPING \\
-\tCORRECTED_A2L "$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" \\
-\t"$(MK_TEMP_DIR)/corrected_A2L" "$(ASAP2_CHECKER)" --autoCorrect --createPickle \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L)) \\
-\t$(if $(TREAT_VECTOR_CORRECTNESS_VIOLATIONS_LENIENTLY),--onlyWarn)
-
-# This is sort of the opposite of the $(SW_TEST_A2L) target. Instead of removing all production data,
-# this target removes any NON-production data and additionally removes the read-only flags from any
-# remaining CHARACTERISTIC items (because they need to be writeable for EOL purposes).
-$(PROD_DATA_FOR_EOL_A2L_FILE_PRECURSOR) : $(CORRECTED_A2L) $(MAKE_PROD_DATA_A2L_FOR_EOL)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Making special production-data-only A2L for EOL purposes."
-
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(MAKE_PROD_DATA_A2L_FOR_EOL)" CORRECTED_A2L PROD_DATA_FOR_EOL_A2L_FILE_PRECURSOR \\
-\tCALIBRATION_PARAM_INFO "$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L))
-
-# Final, reformatted version of $(PROD_DATA_FOR_EOL_A2L_FILE_PRECURSOR).
-$(PROD_DATA_FOR_EOL_A2L_FILE) : $(PROD_DATA_FOR_EOL_A2L_FILE_PRECURSOR) $(REFORMAT_A2L)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Making reformatted version of special production-data-only A2L for EOL purposes."
-
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(REFORMAT_A2L)" "$(VECTOR_ASAP2_CONFIG)" MASTER_A2L_FILE \\
-\tPROD_DATA_FOR_EOL_A2L_FILE_PRECURSOR PROD_DATA_FOR_EOL_A2L_FILE "$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" \\
-\t"$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" "$(MK_TEMP_DIR)/prodData_EOL" "$(ASAP2_CHECKER)" \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L)) \\
-\t$(if $(TREAT_VECTOR_CORRECTNESS_VIOLATIONS_LENIENTLY),--onlyWarn)
-
-# Removes any parameter with invalid addresses from the combined internal/OEM-provided A2L.
-$(COMBINED_A2L_WITHOUT_INVALID_ADDRESSES) : $(COMBINED_INTERNAL_PLUS_OEM_A2L) \\
-$(REMOVE_ITEMS_WITH_INVALID_ADDRESSES) $(BLOCK_ADDR_INFO_FILE) $(CHECK_ADDRESS_OVERLAP_SCRIPT) \\
-$(PRIMARY_IMAGE_POST_PROCESSING_OUTPUT_FILE)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Removing definitions without valid addresses from A2L."
-
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(REMOVE_ITEMS_WITH_INVALID_ADDRESSES)" COMBINED_INTERNAL_PLUS_OEM_A2L \\
-\tCOMBINED_A2L_WITHOUT_INVALID_ADDRESSES CALIBRATION_PARAM_INFO "$(RAM_PARAM_ADDRESS_RANGES)" \\
-\t"$(BLOCK_ADDR_INFO_FILE)" "$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" \\
-\t$(BASE_IMAGES_FOR_CALIBRATION) \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L))
-
-ADDRESS_OVERLAP_CHECK : $(COMBINED_A2L_WITHOUT_INVALID_ADDRESSES)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Performing A2L item address overlap checks."
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(CHECK_ADDRESS_OVERLAP_SCRIPT)" CALIBRATION_PARAM_INFO "$(ELF_FILE)" "$(OBJ_DUMP_EXE)" \\
-\t"$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)"
-
-# If the MAX_REFRESH tag feature is enabled in ComponentConfig.xml, this target extends the A2L so
-# that any RAM parameter has a MAX_REFRESH tag with the value specified in ComponentConfig.xml.
-# Otherwise it just copies the primary dependency.
-$(A2L_WITH_MAX_REFRESH_TAGS) : $(COMBINED_A2L_WITHOUT_INVALID_ADDRESSES) $(ADD_MAX_REFRESH_TAGS) \\
-$(BLOCK_ADDR_INFO_FILE) ADDRESS_OVERLAP_CHECK
-ifneq ($(strip $(ADD_A2L_MAX_REFRESH_TAG_VALUE_TO_RAM_PARAMS)),)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Extending RAM-parameters with MAX_REFRESH tag."
-
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(ADD_MAX_REFRESH_TAGS)" COMBINED_A2L_WITHOUT_INVALID_ADDRESSES \\
-\tA2L_WITH_MAX_REFRESH_TAGS CALIBRATION_PARAM_INFO "$(A2L_MAX_REFRESH_TAG_VALUE)" \\
-\t"$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L))
-else
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Not extending RAM-parameters with MAX_REFRESH tag, as \\
-\tthis feature has been disabled."
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(COPY_ARTEFACT)" COMBINED_A2L_WITHOUT_INVALID_ADDRESSES A2L_WITH_MAX_REFRESH_TAGS \\
-\t"$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)"
-endif
-
-# The directory into which to dump the processed OEM A2L files.
-PROCESSED_OEM_A2L_DIR := $(OUTPUT_DIR)\\processed_OEM_A2L
-
-$(info NOTE: $$(OEM_MODULE_A2L_DIRS) has $(words $(OEM_MODULE_A2L_DIRS)) entries.)
-
-# Get a list of all OEM A2L and ADX files.
-OEM_A2L_FILES :=
-OEM_ADX_FILES :=
-$(foreach OEM_MODULE_A2L_DIR,$(OEM_MODULE_A2L_DIRS),\\
-\t$(eval OEM_A2L_FILES_IN_THIS_DIR := $(wildcard $(OEM_MODULE_A2L_DIR)/*.a2l)) \\
-\t$(eval OEM_ADX_FILES_IN_THIS_DIR := $(wildcard $(OEM_MODULE_A2L_DIR)/*.adx)) \\
-\t$(eval OEM_A2L_FILES_IN_THIS_DIR := $(subst /,\\,$(OEM_A2L_FILES_IN_THIS_DIR))) \\
-\t$(eval OEM_ADX_FILES_IN_THIS_DIR := $(subst /,\\,$(OEM_ADX_FILES_IN_THIS_DIR))) \\
-\t$(eval OEM_A2L_FILES_IN_THIS_DIR := $(sort $(OEM_A2L_FILES_IN_THIS_DIR))) \\
-\t$(eval OEM_ADX_FILES_IN_THIS_DIR := $(sort $(OEM_ADX_FILES_IN_THIS_DIR))) \\
-\t$(eval OEM_A2L_FILES += $(OEM_A2L_FILES_IN_THIS_DIR)) \\
-\t$(eval OEM_ADX_FILES += $(OEM_ADX_FILES_IN_THIS_DIR)) \\
-\t$(eval undefine OEM_A2L_FILES_IN_THIS_DIR) \\
-\t$(eval undefine OEM_ADX_FILES_IN_THIS_DIR) \\
-)
-
-$(info NOTE: $$(OEM_A2L_FILES) has $(words $(OEM_A2L_FILES)) entries.)
-$(info NOTE: $$(OEM_ADX_FILES) has $(words $(OEM_ADX_FILES)) entries.)
-
-# This target creates a catalog file listing the paths of any ADX files provided by the OEM.
-$(CATALOG_OF_OEM_ADX_FILES) : $(OEM_ADX_FILES)
-\t$(file >$@,)
-\t$(foreach OEM_ADX_FILE,$(OEM_ADX_FILES),$(file >>$@,$(OEM_ADX_FILE)))
-
-# This target creates a catalog file listing the paths of any A2L files provided by the OEM.
-$(CATALOG_OF_OEM_A2L_FILES) : $(OEM_A2L_FILES)
-\t$(file >$@,)
-\t$(foreach OEM_A2L_FILE,$(OEM_A2L_FILES),$(file >>$@,$(OEM_A2L_FILE)))
-
-# Target to process OEM A2L files. Entails updating addresses from external sources (if any) or
-# via the Vector ASAP2 updater.
-PROCESSED_OEM_A2L : $(CATALOG_OF_OEM_A2L_FILES) $(CATALOG_OF_OEM_ADX_FILES) $(UPDATE_OEM_A2L_FILES) \\
-$(PRIMARY_LINKER_OUTPUT_IMAGE) $(VECTOR_ASAP2_CONFIG) $(MASTER_A2L_FILE)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Performing address update for OEM A2L files."
-
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(CHECK_A2L_FILE_ENCODINGS)" $(OEM_A2L_FILES) \\
-\t$(if $(TREAT_INCORRECT_A2L_FILE_ENCODINGS_LENIENTLY),--onlyWarn)
-
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(UPDATE_OEM_A2L_FILES)" "$(CATALOG_OF_OEM_ADX_FILES)" MASTER_A2L_FILE "$(LINKER_MAP_FILE)" \\
-\t"$(ELF_FILE)" "$(PROCESSED_OEM_A2L_DIR)" "$(COMPILER_TOOL_CHAIN)" "$(VECTOR_ASAP2_CONFIG)" \\
-\t"$(CATALOG_OF_OEM_A2L_FILES)" "$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" \\
-\t"$(MK_TEMP_DIR)/OEM_addrUpdate" "$(ASAP2_UPDATER)" \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L))
-
-# Make a list of the processed OEM A2L files that must be made from the original A2L files.
-PROCESSED_OEM_A2L_FILES := $(foreach OEM_A2L_FILE, $(OEM_A2L_FILES), $(addprefix $(PROCESSED_OEM_A2L_DIR)/, $(notdir $(OEM_A2L_FILE))))
-PROCESSED_OEM_A2L_FILES := $(call pathsAbs2Rel,$(CURRENT_WORKING_DIR),$(PROCESSED_OEM_A2L_FILES),PROCESSED_OEM_A2L_FILES)
-PROCESSED_OEM_A2L_FILES := $(sort $(PROCESSED_OEM_A2L_FILES))
-
-$(CATALOG_OF_PROCESSED_OEM_A2L_SLAVE_FILES) :
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Making catalog of processed OEM A2L files (for merger to create complete A2L)."
-\t$(file >$@,)
-\t$(foreach PROCESSED_OEM_A2L_FILE,$(PROCESSED_OEM_A2L_FILES),$(file >>$@,$(PROCESSED_OEM_A2L_FILE)))
-
-$(CATALOG_FOR_ADDRESS_UPDATED_INTERNAL_A2L) :
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Making catalog of address-updated internal A2L (for merger to create complete A2L)."
-\t$(file >$@,$(ADDRESS_UPDATED_INTERNAL_A2L))
-
-# Merges our internal A2L with the OEM-provided A2L(s). If we don\'t have any OEM A2L files, this target
-# will simply create a copy of our internal A2L.
-$(COMBINED_INTERNAL_PLUS_OEM_A2L) : PROCESSED_OEM_A2L $(ADDRESS_UPDATED_INTERNAL_A2L) $(VECTOR_ASAP2_CONFIG) \\
-$(CATALOG_OF_PROCESSED_OEM_A2L_SLAVE_FILES) $(CATALOG_FOR_ADDRESS_UPDATED_INTERNAL_A2L) $(MASTER_A2L_FILE)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Merging address-updated internal A2L with OEM A2L files (if any)."
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(MERGE_A2L_FILES)" "$(VECTOR_ASAP2_CONFIG)" MASTER_A2L_FILE COMBINED_INTERNAL_PLUS_OEM_A2L \\
-\t"$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" "$(MK_TEMP_DIR)/mergeInternal+OEM" \\
-\t"$(ASAP2_MERGER)" "$(CATALOG_OF_PROCESSED_OEM_A2L_SLAVE_FILES)" "$(CATALOG_FOR_ADDRESS_UPDATED_INTERNAL_A2L)" \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L))
-
-# This target takes the input A2L and enriches it with the actual addresses of the various
-# parameters and measurements (obtained from the ELF file).
-$(ADDRESS_UPDATED_INTERNAL_A2L) : $(A2L_WITH_MEASUREMENT_TIME_SLICE_MAPPINGS) \\
-$(MASTER_A2L_FILE) $(PRIMARY_LINKER_OUTPUT_IMAGE) $(UPDATE_A2L_FILE) $(VECTOR_ASAP2_CONFIG)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Updating memory addresses in internal A2L."
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(UPDATE_A2L_FILE)" "$(VECTOR_ASAP2_CONFIG)" "$(ELF_FILE)" \\
-\tA2L_WITH_MEASUREMENT_TIME_SLICE_MAPPINGS ADDRESS_UPDATED_INTERNAL_A2L MASTER_A2L_FILE \\
-\t"$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" \\
-\t"$(MK_TEMP_DIR)/internalAddrUpdate" "$(ASAP2_UPDATER)" "$(COMPILER_TOOL_CHAIN)" \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L))
-
-ifndef RUNNING_IN_OEM_MODE
-ifdef APPLY_MEASUREMENT_TO_TIME_SLICE_MAP
-# This target enriches the complete internal A2L with the default measurement raster selections.
-# NOTE: In the OEM-BE, this is currently the entry point into the A2L part of the build (the
-# $(A2L_WITH_MEASUREMENT_TIME_SLICE_MAPPINGS) is taken from the OEM pre-release, and this target is
-# the first that does anything with that file).
-#
-# NOTE: In the OEM-BE, $(A2L_WITH_MEASUREMENT_TIME_SLICE_MAPPINGS) is not generated but taken
-# directly from the pre-packaged OEM-pre-release. This also means that the file created here is
-# placed into the OEM-pre-release when an OEM-BE is assembled.
-$(A2L_WITH_MEASUREMENT_TIME_SLICE_MAPPINGS) : $(ARRAY_INDEX_NOTATION_ADJUSTED_INTERNAL_A2L) \\
-$(A2L_MEASUREMENT_TIME_SLICES_UPDATER) $(MEASUREMENTS_TO_TIME_SLICE_MAP)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Enriching internal A2L with measurement raster selections."
-
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(A2L_MEASUREMENT_TIME_SLICES_UPDATER)" ARRAY_INDEX_NOTATION_ADJUSTED_INTERNAL_A2L \\
-\tA2L_WITH_MEASUREMENT_TIME_SLICE_MAPPINGS "$(MEASUREMENTS_TO_TIME_SLICE_MAP)" \\
-\t"$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L))
-
-else
-$(A2L_WITH_MEASUREMENT_TIME_SLICE_MAPPINGS) : $(ARRAY_INDEX_NOTATION_ADJUSTED_INTERNAL_A2L)
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(COPY_ARTEFACT)" ARRAY_INDEX_NOTATION_ADJUSTED_INTERNAL_A2L \\
-\tA2L_WITH_MEASUREMENT_TIME_SLICE_MAPPINGS "$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)"
-endif
-
-# Before the address update, we have to convert arrays from this format (array[0].member) to this
-# format (array._0_.member). Vector\'s ASAP2 Updater cannot deal with the former.
-$(ARRAY_INDEX_NOTATION_ADJUSTED_INTERNAL_A2L) : $(DEM_ID_PROCESSED_A2L) \\
-$(ADJUST_A2L_ARRAY_INDEX_NOTATION) $(BLOCK_ADDR_INFO_FILE)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Adjusting array index notation in internal A2L."
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(ADJUST_A2L_ARRAY_INDEX_NOTATION)" DEM_ID_PROCESSED_A2L \\
-\tARRAY_INDEX_NOTATION_ADJUSTED_INTERNAL_A2L "$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" \\
-\t"$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L))
-
-$(DEM_ID_PROCESSED_A2L) : $(COMPLETE_INTERNAL_A2L) $(NUMERIC_DEM_IDS_TO_SYMBOLIC_DEM_IDS) \\
-$(A2L_DEM_ERR_ID_HEADER) $(A2L_DEM_EVT_ID_HEADER)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Making DEM-ID processed A2L."
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(NUMERIC_DEM_IDS_TO_SYMBOLIC_DEM_IDS)" COMPLETE_INTERNAL_A2L DEM_ID_PROCESSED_A2L \\
-\t"$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" "$(A2L_DEM_ERR_ID_HEADER)" \\
-\t"$(A2L_DEM_EVT_ID_HEADER)" \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L))
-
-# Perl script to scan C files and store C-style macros in ASAP2Creator format.
-$(MACROS_INI) : $(MACROS_TEMPLATE) $(ASAP2_MACRO_GENERATOR_SCRIPT) \\
-$(LIST_OF_FILES_USED_DURING_COMPILATION)
-\t$(info $(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Making A2L creator macro ini file.)
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(ASAP2_MACRO_GENERATOR_SCRIPT)" "$(SYMBOLIC_PATHS_FILE)" \\
-\t"$(LIST_OF_FILES_USED_DURING_COMPILATION)" "$(MACROS_TEMPLATE)" "$@"
-
-# NOTE: The LINKER_MAP_FILE is a side product of the PRIMARY_LINKER_OUTPUT_IMAGE target, so it\'s not listed
-# here as an explicit dependency.
-$(MASTER_A2L_FILE) : $(PRIMARY_LINKER_OUTPUT_IMAGE) $(A2L_MASTER_TEMPLATE) $(SUBST_SYMBOLS_IN_A2L_MASTER_TPL)
-\t$(info $(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Substituting symbolic constants in master A2L template file.)
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(CHECK_A2L_FILE_ENCODINGS)" "$(A2L_MASTER_TEMPLATE)" \\
-\t$(if $(TREAT_INCORRECT_A2L_FILE_ENCODINGS_LENIENTLY),--onlyWarn)
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(SUBST_SYMBOLS_IN_A2L_MASTER_TPL)" "$(A2L_MASTER_TEMPLATE)" "$(LINKER_MAP_FILE)" "$@" \\
-\t"$(COMPILER_TOOL_CHAIN)"
-
-# Pick up any A2L files that have been generated by the AUTOSAR build.
-AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES := $(wildcard $(GENERATED_DIR)/*.a2l)
-AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES := $(subst /,\\,$(AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES))
-
-# AUTOSAR also generates a RecordLayouts.A2L file, which must be ignored, so filter it out.
-AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES := $(call filter-out-ext,RecordLayouts.A2L,$(AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES))
-
-AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES := $(sort $(AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES))
-
-# For each AUTOSAR generated A2L file, we need a processed version.
-PROCESSED_AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES := $(foreach A2L_FILE, $(AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES), $(addsuffix _generated.a2l, $(addprefix $(MK_TEMP_DIR)/, $(basename $(notdir $(A2L_FILE))))))
-PROCESSED_AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES := $(subst /,\\,$(PROCESSED_AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES))
-PROCESSED_AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES := $(sort $(PROCESSED_AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES))
-
-# Preprocess the automatically generated AUTOSAR A2L files.
-$(PROCESSED_AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES) : $(MK_TEMP_DIR)\\\\%_generated.a2l : $(GENERATED_DIR)\\\\%.a2l
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Processing AUTOSAR-generated A2L file $(subst \\,/,$<) and storing result at $(subst \\,/,$@.)"
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(A2L_ADAPT_DEM)" "$<" "$@"
-
-$(A2L_SLAVE_DEM_STR) : $(CREATE_DEM_EVENT_A2L) $(A2L_DEM_ERR_ID_HEADER) $(A2L_DEM_EVT_ID_HEADER)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Making DEM A2L slave file."
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(CREATE_DEM_EVENT_A2L)" "$@" "$(A2L_DEM_ERR_ID_HEADER)" "$(A2L_DEM_EVT_ID_HEADER)"
-
-# Creates a catalog file containing the absolute path of the DEM A2L slave file.
-$(CATALOG_FOR_DEM_SLAVE_A2L) :
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Making DEM A2L slave catalog file."
-\t$(file >$@,$(A2L_SLAVE_DEM_STR))
-
-# This target creates a catalog file containing the paths of any AUTOSAR-generated slave A2L files.
-$(CATALOG_OF_AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_SLAVE_FILES) : $(PROCESSED_AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Making catalog of AUTOSAR-generated slave A2L files."
-\t$(file >$@,)
-\t$(foreach PROCESSED_AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILE,$(PROCESSED_AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILES),$(file >>$@,$(PROCESSED_AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_FILE)))
-
-# This target parses any ASM/C source files to create a slave A2L file for each C source file that
-# uses meta comments to define A2L items. The paths of all slave A2L files created in this way are
-# stored in the $(CATALOG_OF_A2L_SLAVE_FILES_FROM_SOURCES) file.
-$(CATALOG_OF_A2L_SLAVE_FILES_FROM_SOURCES) : $(MASTER_A2L_FILE) $(PARSE_A2L_COMMENTS_FROM_SOURCES) \\
-$(VECTOR_ASAP2_CONFIG) $(LIST_OF_FILES_USED_DURING_COMPILATION) $(MACROS_INI)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Making catalog of slave A2L files generated from ASM/C sources."
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(PARSE_A2L_COMMENTS_FROM_SOURCES)" "$(VECTOR_ASAP2_CONFIG)" "$(MACROS_INI)" \\
-\tMASTER_A2L_FILE "$@" "$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" \\
-\t"$(LIST_OF_FILES_USED_DURING_COMPILATION)" "$(INCLUDE_SEARCH_PATHS_FILE)" \\
-\t"$(DEPENDENCY_FILE_DIR)" "$(MK_TEMP_DIR)/parseSrc_A2L" "$(ASAP2_CREATOR)" \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L))
-
-# This target creates a catalog file containing the paths of all internal A2L slave files that are
-# not build results but have been deployed as prebuilt artefacts.
-# This is phony target to ensure it is always rebuilt (to help minimize the chances of the build
-# not noticing deleted or newly added A2L files).
-MAKE_CATALOG_OF_PREBUILT_INTERNAL_A2L_SLAVE_FILES :
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Making catalog of internal, prebuilt slave A2L files."
-\t$(call comment,Collect any A2L slave files provided by static external components.)
-\t$(call comment,NOTE: This does NOT account for A2L slave files provided by dynamic external)
-\t$(call comment,components, which are dealt with separately.)
-\t$(foreach LINKABLE_EXTERNAL_COMPONENT_ROOT_DIR, $(ROOT_DIRS_OF_LINKABLE_EXTERNAL_COMPONENTS), \\
-\t\t$(eval CONSUMABLE_SLAVE_A2L_FILES += $(wildcard $(LINKABLE_EXTERNAL_COMPONENT_ROOT_DIR)/a2l/*.a2l)) \\
-\t)
-
-\t$(eval A2L_SLAVE_FILES += $(CONSUMABLE_SLAVE_A2L_FILES))
-
-\t$(file >$(CATALOG_OF_PREBUILT_INTERNAL_A2L_SLAVE_FILES),)
-\t$(foreach SLAVE,$(A2L_SLAVE_FILES),$(file >>$(CATALOG_OF_PREBUILT_INTERNAL_A2L_SLAVE_FILES),$(SLAVE)))
-
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(CHECK_A2L_FILE_ENCODINGS)" $(CATALOG_OF_PREBUILT_INTERNAL_A2L_SLAVE_FILES) \\
-\t$(if $(TREAT_INCORRECT_A2L_FILE_ENCODINGS_LENIENTLY),--onlyWarn)
-
-$(CATALOG_OF_PREBUILT_INTERNAL_A2L_SLAVE_FILES) : MAKE_CATALOG_OF_PREBUILT_INTERNAL_A2L_SLAVE_FILES
-
-# Combines all internal (i.e. non-OEM-provided) A2L definitions into one large file.
-$(COMPLETE_INTERNAL_A2L) : $(CATALOG_OF_A2L_SLAVE_FILES_FROM_SOURCES) \\
-$(CATALOG_OF_AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_SLAVE_FILES) $(CATALOG_OF_PREBUILT_INTERNAL_A2L_SLAVE_FILES) \\
-$(CATALOG_FOR_DEM_SLAVE_A2L) $(MERGE_A2L_FILES) $(VECTOR_ASAP2_CONFIG) $(A2L_SLAVE_DEM_STR) \\
-$(MASTER_A2L_FILE)
-\t@$(ECHO) "$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) Merging master/DEM A2L with internal slave A2L files."
-\t"$(PERL)" "$(MERGE_A2L_FILES)" "$(VECTOR_ASAP2_CONFIG)" MASTER_A2L_FILE COMPLETE_INTERNAL_A2L \\
-\t"$(ARTEFACT_CATALOG_FILE)" "$(BASE_FOR_RELATIVE_ARTEFACT_PATHS)" "$(MK_TEMP_DIR)/mergeInternal" \\
-\t"$(ASAP2_MERGER)" "$(CATALOG_OF_A2L_SLAVE_FILES_FROM_SOURCES)" "$(CATALOG_FOR_DEM_SLAVE_A2L)" \\
-\t"$(CATALOG_OF_AUTOSAR_GENERATED_A2L_SLAVE_FILES)" "$(CATALOG_OF_PREBUILT_INTERNAL_A2L_SLAVE_FILES)" \\
-\t$(if $(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L),--lenient=$(LENIENT_FLAGS_FOR_A2L))
-
-endif
