-\tmy $itemTypePluginManager = getItemTypePluginManager( $self, $dbgLogger );
-\tassert( defined( $itemTypePluginManager ) );
-
-\tmy (
-\t\tundef,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems
-\t) = A2L_Lib2::ItemTypePluginManager::getItemTypeReferenceRelationships(
-\t\t$itemTypePluginManager,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy %nullReferenceKeywordsTable = NULL_REFERENCE_KEYWORDS;
-
-\tmy $instanceOptions = $$self{ \'options\' };
-\tassert( defined( $instanceOptions ) );
-
-\tmy %predefinedDataTypeLookupTable = A2L_Lib2::PredefinedDataTypes::makePredefinedDataTypeLookupTable(
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\tA2L_Lib2::Util::getLenientOptionsDict( $dbgLogger, %$instanceOptions )
-\t);
-
-\tmy $metaDataTypeDictForModule = __getMetaDataCacheForType(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\tundef,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy %variablePositionFieldsLookupTable = A2L_Lib2::VariablePositionFields::VARIABLE_POSITION_FIELDS_LOOKUP_TABLE;
-
-\tmy $allRefsInThisModule = __getItemReferencesInThisModule(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$metaDataTypeDictForModule,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t\t\\%variablePositionFieldsLookupTable,
-\t\t\\%nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t\\%predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\tFALSE,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy $referencesRenamed = 0;
-
-\tforeach my $itemType ( sort( keys( %$allRefsInThisModule ) ) )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $keyDict = $$allRefsInThisModule{ $itemType };
-
-\t\tforeach my $itemKey ( sort( keys( %$keyDict ) ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy $listOfReferenceSubfieldInstancesInThisItem = $$keyDict{ $itemKey };
-
-\t\t\tforeach my $referenceSubfieldInstance ( @$listOfReferenceSubfieldInstancesInThisItem )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tmy @references = A2L_Lib2::ReferenceSubfield::getItemReferenceInstances(
-\t\t\t\t\t$referenceSubfieldInstance
-\t\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t\tforeach my $reference ( @references )
-\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\tmy $nameOfReferencedItem = A2L_Lib2::ItemReference::getNameOfReferencedObject(
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$reference
-\t\t\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t\t\tif ( ! A2L_Lib2::ItemReference::resolve( $reference, $metaDataTypeDictForModule,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger ) )
-\t\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# This reference has been resolved -> it cannot possibly be one that
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# must be updated.
-\t\t\t\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t\t\tmy $newName = $$oldNamesToNewNames{ $nameOfReferencedItem };
-
-\t\t\t\t\tif ( ! defined( $newName ) )
-\t\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# Not a reference to an item we\'re supposed to rename.
-\t\t\t\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t\t\tA2L_Lib2::ItemReference::rename( $reference, $newName );
-\t\t\t\t\t++$referencesRenamed;
-\t\t\t\t}
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\tif ( ! $$instanceOptions{ \'noTiming\' } )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $duration = Time::HiRes::time() - $timeAtStart;
-\t\tif ( $duration < 0.0 ) { $duration = 0.0; }
-
-\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t"NOTE: %s Took %u.%03u seconds to update %u references to renamed items in " .
-\t\t\t\t"project %s / module %s.\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getPackageContextWithTimeStampString(),
-\t\t\t$duration,
-\t\t\t( $duration - int( $duration ) ) * 1000,
-\t\t\t$referencesRenamed,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t);
-\t}
-}
-
-sub __findItemInTheseMetaDataDicts($$@)
-{
-\tmy ( $itemKey, $throwIfNotFound, $dbgLogger, @metaDataCategories ) = @_;
-
-\tif ( ! @metaDataCategories )
-\t{
-\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] Empty namespace specified (contains no item types)!\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getContext()
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\tforeach my $itemTypeMetaDict ( @metaDataCategories )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $metaData = $$itemTypeMetaDict{ $itemKey };
-
-\t\tif ( defined( $metaData ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\treturn ( $metaData, $itemTypeMetaDict );
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\tif ( $throwIfNotFound )
-\t{
-\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] None of the specified item type meta-data dictionaries contain an item " .
-\t\t\t\t"with key %s!\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t$itemKey
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\treturn ( undef, undef );
-}
-
-sub __initByParsing($$%)
-{
-\tmy ( $pathOf_A2L_file, $dbgLogger, %options ) = @_;
-
-\tmy $startTime = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\t# NOTE: No need to check the $pathOf_A2L_file argument. The A2L_Lib2::Parse::parse function or one
-\t# of its subroutines takes care of that for us.
-
-\tmy ( $rootElement, $a2lDocType, $itemTypePluginManager, $inputEncoding ) = A2L_Lib2::Parse::parse(
-\t\t$pathOf_A2L_file,
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%options
-\t);
-
-\tassert( defined( $rootElement ) );
-\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $a2lDocType ) );
-\tassert( defined( $itemTypePluginManager ) );
-
-\tmy %unblessedInstance = (
-\t\t\'rootElement\' => $rootElement,
-
-\t\t\'originalDocType\' => $a2lDocType,
-
-\t\t\'pathOf_A2L_file\' => $pathOf_A2L_file,
-
-\t\t\'options\' => \\%options,
-
-\t\t# In this dictionary, we cache information about any item references so we don\'t have to
-\t\t# re-obtain this information every time we need it.
-\t\t\'refs\' => {
-\t\t    #\'VW_MEB_LE1\' => {
-\t\t    #    \'CPP\' => {...} # <- reference dictionary
-\t\t    #}
-\t\t},
-
-\t\t# Initially empty item type cache, including a commented-out example of what it would look
-\t\t# like if it were already fully populated.
-\t\t# Data is grouped by project / module combinations.
-\t\t\'itemsByType\' => {
-
-\t\t\t#\'VW_MEB_LE1\' => {   # <- project name
-\t\t\t#    \'CPP\' => {   # <- module name
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#        \'CHARACTERISTIC\' => {...},
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#        \'AXIS_PTS\' => {...},
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#        \'MEASUREMENT\' => {...},
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#        \'RECORD_LAYOUT\' => {...},
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#        \'TYPEDEF_CHARACTERISTIC\' => {...},
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#        \'TYPEDEF_MEASUREMENT\' => {...},
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#        \'TYPEDEF_AXIS\' => {...},
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#        ...
-\t\t\t#    },
-\t\t\t#},
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#\'VW_MEB_LE2\' => {  # <- project name
-\t\t\t#    \'FOOBAR\' => {   # <- module name
-\t\t\t#        \'CHARACTERISTIC\' => {...},
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#        \'AXIS_PTS\' => {...},
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#        \'MEASUREMENT\' => {...},
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#        \'RECORD_LAYOUT\' => {...},
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#        \'TYPEDEF_CHARACTERISTIC\' => {...},
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#        \'TYPEDEF_MEASUREMENT\' => {...},
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#        \'TYPEDEF_AXIS\' => {...},
-\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t#        ...
-\t\t\t#    }
-\t\t\t#}
-\t\t}
-\t);
-
-\t__tallyAndResolveItems( \\%unblessedInstance, $dbgLogger );
-
-\tif ( ! $options{ \'noTiming\' } )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $duration = Time::HiRes::time() - $startTime;
-\t\tif ( $duration < 0.0 ) { $duration = 0.0; }
-
-\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t"NOTE: %s Took %u.%03u seconds to load %s.\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getPackageContextWithTimeStampString(),
-\t\t\t$duration,
-\t\t\t( $duration - int( $duration ) ) * 1000,
-\t\t\t$a2lDocType
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\t$dbgLogger->print( sub {
-\t\tlocal( $Data::Dumper::Sortkeys ) = 1;
-\t\treturn sprintf(
-\t\t\t"Content of \'itemsByType\' dictionary:\
\
%s\
",
-\t\t\tData::Dumper::Dumper( $unblessedInstance{ \'itemsByType\' } )
-\t\t);
-\t} );
-
-\treturn ( \\%unblessedInstance, $itemTypePluginManager );
-}
-
-# Returns a dictionary containing all project / module combinations contained in the A2L document.
-# Here\'s an example of what the returned dictionary might look like:
-#
-# my %projectModuleCombos = (
-#     \'myMainProject\' => {
-#         \'module_A\' => TRUE(),
-#         \'module_B\' => TRUE()
-#     },
-#
-#     \'mySecondaryProject\' => {
-#         \'module_foo\' => TRUE(),
-#         \'module_bar\' => TRUE()
-#     }
-# );
-sub getProjectModuleCombos
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\tmy %projectModuleCombos = ();
-
-\t__walkTypeCacheForTheseProjectModuleCombos(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\tsub {
-\t\t\tmy ( $currentProjectName, $currentModuleName, $metaDataTypeDict, $dbgLogger_ ) = @_;
-
-\t\t\tmy $projectEntry = $projectModuleCombos{ $currentProjectName };
-
-\t\t\tif ( ! defined( $projectEntry ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t$projectEntry = $projectModuleCombos{ $currentProjectName } = {};
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t$$projectEntry{ $currentModuleName } = TRUE;
-
-\t\t\treturn TRUE;
-\t\t},
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\t# There must always be at least one project / module.
-\tassert( keys( %projectModuleCombos ) );
-
-\treturn %projectModuleCombos;
-}
-
-# Returns an A2L_Lib2::ParamInfo instance containing all A2L calibration parameter related
-# information obtained from this A2L document.
-#
-# Note that the $rawImageReader\'s readByteList() method will be invoked only if the A2L document
-# contains at least one CHARACTERISTIC / AXIS_PTS element with dynamic data, such as a dynamically
-# configurable number of axis points.
-sub getParamInfo
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$rawImageReader,
-\t\t$flashBlockAddrRangesFile,
-\t\t$addrRangesOf_RAM,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tmy $instanceOptions = $$self{ \'options\' };
-\tassert( defined( $instanceOptions ) );
-
-\tmy $paramInfoInstance;
-
-\t__walkTypeCacheForTheseProjectModuleCombos(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\tsub {
-\t\t\tmy ( $currentProjectName, $currentModuleName, $metaDataTypeDict, $dbgLogger_ ) = @_;
-
-\t\t\tif ( $currentProjectName ne $projectName )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t# Not the project we\'re interested in; skip.
-\t\t\t\treturn TRUE;
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\tif ( $currentModuleName ne $moduleName )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t# Not the module we\'re interested in; skip.
-\t\t\t\treturn TRUE;
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\tmy $moduleNodesDict = $$metaDataTypeDict{ \'MODULE\' };
-\t\t\tmy @moduleNodes = values( %$moduleNodesDict );
-\t\t\tassert( @moduleNodes == 1 );
-\t\t\tmy $moduleNodeMetaData = $moduleNodes[ 0 ];
-\t\t\tmy $moduleNode = $$moduleNodeMetaData{ \'element\' };
-
-\t\t\t## @todo Perhaps the %applAddressRanges dictionary should be passed into the
-\t\t\t## getParamInfo() method instead ...
-\t\t\tmy %applAddressRanges = A2L_Lib2::ParamInfo::UtilityFuncs::getApplAddressRanges(
-\t\t\t\t$flashBlockAddrRangesFile,
-\t\t\t\t$addrRangesOf_RAM,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t$paramInfoInstance = A2L_Lib2::ParamInfo->initializeFromDocument(
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleNode,
-\t\t\t\t$rawImageReader,
-\t\t\t\t$metaDataTypeDict,
-\t\t\t\t\\%applAddressRanges,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_,
-\t\t\t\t%$instanceOptions
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\treturn FALSE;
-\t\t},
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t( $projectName => { $moduleName => TRUE() } )
-\t);
-
-\tif ( ! defined( $paramInfoInstance ) )
-\t{
-\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] Failed to extract parameter info for project %s / module %s. No such " .
-\t\t\t\t"project / module!\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\treturn $paramInfoInstance;
-}
-
-# Performs a cleanup in the specified modules if there is a chance that they may be untidy.
-# A cleanup entails the following operations:
-#
-# - removing unreferenced items (for instance, unused RECORD_LAYOUT items)
-#
-# - removing "empty" items (for instance, FUNCTION items that do not reference any calibratable
-#   objects, measurements or subfunctions)
-#
-# - resetting / removing references to non-existent items.
-#
-# The function does not return anything.
-sub cleanup($$$$%)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$resetReferenceCache,
-\t\t$allowRemovalOfDependentItems,
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%projectModuleCombinationFilters
-\t) = @_;
-
-\t__walkTypeCacheForTheseProjectModuleCombos(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\tsub {
-\t\t\tmy ( $projectName, $moduleName, $metaDataTypeDict, $dbgLogger_ ) = @_;
-
-\t\t\t__cleanUpModule(
-\t\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\tTRUE,
-\t\t\t\t$resetReferenceCache,
-\t\t\t\t$allowRemovalOfDependentItems,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\treturn TRUE;
-\t\t},
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%projectModuleCombinationFilters
-\t);
-}
-
-# Serializes the A2L document, i.e. writes it to an A2L file.
-# The function does not return anything.
-sub serialize($$$)
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $destinationFilePath, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\tmy $rootElement = $$self{ \'rootElement\' };
-\tassert( defined( $rootElement ) );
-
-\tmy $instanceOptions = $$self{ \'options\' };
-\tassert( defined( $instanceOptions ) );
-
-\tA2L_Lib2::Write::writeFile(
-\t\t$rootElement,
-\t\t$destinationFilePath,
-\t\tgetItemTypePluginManager( $self, $dbgLogger ),
-\t\tA2L_Lib2::BasicDefs::DEFAULT_A2L_FILE_ENCODING,
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%$instanceOptions
-\t);
-}
-
-# Internal helper function for the removeSpecifiedItems implementation. Based on the specified
-# %itemsToRemove dictionary, returns a dictionary containing all project/module combinations
-# to pass to the __walkTypeCacheForTheseProjectModuleCombos for iterating the document.
-sub __buildDictOfProjectModuleCombosToWalk($%)
-{
-\tmy ( $dbgLogger, %itemsToRemove ) = @_;
-
-\tmy %projectModuleCombinationFilters = ();
-
-\tforeach my $projectName ( sort( keys( %itemsToRemove ) ) )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $modulesInProject = $itemsToRemove{ $projectName };
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $modulesInProject ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tlocal( $Data::Dumper::Sortkeys ) = 1;
-\t\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] Corrupt %%itemsToRemove dictionary passed! Value for key \\"%s\\" " .
-\t\t\t\t\t"is undefined (or doesn\'t exist at all)! Complete dump of %%itemsToRemove " .
-\t\t\t\t\t"dictionary:\
\
%s\
\
",
-\t\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\tData::Dumper::Dumper( \\%itemsToRemove )
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tmy @moduleNames = sort( keys( %$modulesInProject ) );
-
-\t\tif ( ! @moduleNames )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tdelete $projectModuleCombinationFilters{ $projectName };
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tmy $projectEntry = $projectModuleCombinationFilters{ $projectName };
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $projectEntry ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t$projectEntry = $projectModuleCombinationFilters{ $projectName } = {};
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tforeach my $moduleName ( @moduleNames )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy $typesInModule = $$modulesInProject{ $moduleName };
-
-\t\t\tif ( defined( $typesInModule ) && keys( %$typesInModule ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t$$projectEntry{ $moduleName } = TRUE;
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tif ( ! keys( %$projectEntry ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t# Nothing was added to this project at all, so there is no point in keeping the entry
-\t\t\t# in our project/module combo dictionary.
-\t\t\tdelete $projectModuleCombinationFilters{ $projectName };
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\treturn %projectModuleCombinationFilters;
-}
-
-# Deletes the specified elements from the A2L document. The items to remove must be specified in the
-# %itemsToRemove dictionary. The dictionary must be structured as follows (example):
-#
-# my %itemsToRemove = (
-#     \'myProject\' => {
-#         \'module_A\' => {
-#             \'CHARACTERISTIC\' => [
-#                 \'myCharacteristic_A\',
-#                 \'myCharacteristic_B\',
-#                 \'myCharacteristic_C\'
-#             ],
-#
-#             \'MEASUREMENT\' => [
-#                 \'myMeasurement_A\',
-#                 \'myMeasurement_B\'
-#             ],
-#
-#             # further entries ...
-#         },
-#
-#         \'module_B\' => {
-#
-#             \'MEMORY_SEGMENT\' => [
-#                 \'myMemorySegment_A\',
-#                 \'myMemorySegment_F\'
-#             ],
-#
-#             # further entries ...
-#         }
-#     }
-# );
-#
-# Note that additional items may have been removed as a result of having become empty / unreferenced
-# through this action.
-#
-# The function does not return anything.
-sub removeSpecifiedItems($$$%)
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $allowRemovalOfDependentItems, $dbgLogger, %itemsToRemove ) = @_;
-
-\tmy %projectModuleCombinationFilters = __buildDictOfProjectModuleCombosToWalk(
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%itemsToRemove
-\t);
-
-\tif ( ! keys( %projectModuleCombinationFilters ) )
-\t{
-\t\t# Nothing for us to do at all.
-\t\treturn;
-\t}
-
-\tmy $itemTypePluginManager = getItemTypePluginManager( $self, $dbgLogger );
-\tassert( defined( $itemTypePluginManager ) );
-
-\tmy (
-\t\t$itemTypesThatAreReferenceable,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems
-\t) = $itemTypePluginManager->getItemTypeReferenceRelationships( $dbgLogger );
-
-\tmy %primaryReferenceItemTypes = map { $_ => undef } PRIMARY_REFERENCE_ITEM_TYPES;
-
-\tmy %nullReferenceKeywordsTable = NULL_REFERENCE_KEYWORDS;
-
-\tmy $instanceOptions = $$self{ \'options\' };
-\tassert( defined( $instanceOptions ) );
-
-\tmy %predefinedDataTypeLookupTable = A2L_Lib2::PredefinedDataTypes::makePredefinedDataTypeLookupTable(
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\tA2L_Lib2::Util::getLenientOptionsDict( $dbgLogger, %$instanceOptions )
-\t);
-
-\tmy %variablePositionFieldsLookupTable = A2L_Lib2::VariablePositionFields::VARIABLE_POSITION_FIELDS_LOOKUP_TABLE;
-
-\t__walkTypeCacheForTheseProjectModuleCombos(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\tsub {
-\t\t\tmy ( $projectName, $moduleName, $metaDataTypeDictForModule, $dbgLogger_ ) = @_;
-
-\t\t\tmy @toRemove = ();
-
-\t\t\tmy $modulesFromWhichToRemoveItems = $itemsToRemove{ $projectName };
-\t\t\tmy $typesToRemove = $$modulesFromWhichToRemoveItems{ $moduleName };
-
-\t\t\tforeach my $itemType ( keys( %$typesToRemove ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tmy $metaDataForItemsOfThisType = $$metaDataTypeDictForModule{ $itemType };
-
-\t\t\t\tif ( ! defined( $metaDataForItemsOfThisType ) )
-\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\t# Got no items of this type.
-\t\t\t\t\t#
-\t\t\t\t\t## @todo We should probably check if this is even a valid item type at all!
-\t\t\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t\tmy $itemsOfThisTypeToRemove = $$typesToRemove{ $itemType };
-
-\t\t\t\tforeach my $keyOfItemToRemove ( @$itemsOfThisTypeToRemove )
-\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\tmy $metaDataForItem = $$metaDataForItemsOfThisType{ $keyOfItemToRemove };
-
-\t\t\t\t\tif ( ! defined( $metaDataForItem ) )
-\t\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# The specified item does not exist. Since we were going to remove it
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# anyway, the end result is going to be the same. Nothing to do here.
-\t\t\t\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t\t\tpush( @toRemove, $metaDataForItem );
-\t\t\t\t}
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\tif ( @toRemove )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tmy $itemRefsInThisModule = __getItemReferencesInThisModule(
-\t\t\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\t\t$metaDataTypeDictForModule,
-\t\t\t\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t\t\t\t\t\\%variablePositionFieldsLookupTable,
-\t\t\t\t\t\\%nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t\t\t\t\\%predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\t\t\t\tFALSE,
-\t\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t\t__removeTheseElementsFromThisModule(
-\t\t\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\t\t\\@toRemove,
-\t\t\t\t\tFALSE,
-\t\t\t\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule,
-\t\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t\t__cleanUpModule(
-\t\t\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\t\tFALSE,
-\t\t\t\t\tFALSE,
-\t\t\t\t\t$allowRemovalOfDependentItems,
-\t\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t\t);
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\treturn TRUE;
-\t\t},
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%projectModuleCombinationFilters
-\t);
-}
-
-# Deletes any calibratable objects that are excluded via the specified blacklist / whitelist file.
-#
-# Note that additional items may have been removed as a result of having become empty / unreferenced
-# through this action.
-sub removeExcludedCalibratableObjects
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $excluder, $measurementsAsWell, $dbgLogger, %projectModuleCombinationFilters ) = @_;
-
-\tif ( ! defined( $excluder ) )
-\t{
-\t\t# Nothing removed, got no filters.
-\t\treturn;
-\t}
-
-\tif ( ! $excluder->filterIsActive( $dbgLogger ) )
-\t{
-\t\t# Nothing removed.
-\t\treturn;
-\t}
-
-\tmy %itemsToRemove = ();
-
-\tmy @calibratableObjectTypes = qw( AXIS_PTS CHARACTERISTIC );
-
-\tif ( $measurementsAsWell )
-\t{
-\t\tpush( @calibratableObjectTypes, \'MEASUREMENT\' );
-\t}
-
-\t__walkTypeCacheForTheseProjectModuleCombos(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\tsub {
-\t\t\tmy ( $projectName, $moduleName, $metaDataTypeDictForModule, $dbgLogger_ ) = @_;
-
-\t\t\tmy @toRemove = __getExcludedCalibratableObjectsToRemove(
-\t\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\t\\@calibratableObjectTypes,
-\t\t\t\t$excluder,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\tif ( @toRemove )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tmy $moduleDict = $itemsToRemove{ $projectName } = {};
-\t\t\t\tmy $module = $$moduleDict{ $moduleName } = {};
-
-\t\t\t\tforeach my $itemMetaData ( @toRemove )
-\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\tmy $element = $$itemMetaData{ \'element\' };
-\t\t\t\t\tassert( defined( $element ) );
-
-\t\t\t\t\tmy $type = $$element{ \'type\' };
-\t\t\t\t\tassert( defined( $type ) );
-
-\t\t\t\t\tmy $name = $$element{ \'name\' };
-\t\t\t\t\tassert( defined( $name ) );
-
-\t\t\t\t\tmy $itemsOfThisType = $$module{ $type };
-
-\t\t\t\t\tif ( ! defined( $itemsOfThisType ) )
-\t\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$itemsOfThisType = $$module{ $type } = [];
-\t\t\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t\t\tpush( @$itemsOfThisType, $name );
-\t\t\t\t}
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\treturn TRUE;
-\t\t},
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%projectModuleCombinationFilters
-\t);
-
-\tremoveSpecifiedItems( $self, TRUE, $dbgLogger, %itemsToRemove );
-}
-
-sub __tallyAndResolveItems($$%)
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $dbgLogger, %projectModuleCombinationFilters ) = @_;
-
-\t## @todo Either check if the analysis for the requested project/module combos has
-\t## already been gathered and only do the missing combos, or flat-out insist that this method
-\t## may only be called once per instance of this class!
-
-\tmy $instanceOptions = $$self{ \'options\' };
-\tassert( defined( $instanceOptions ) );
-
-\tmy $itemTypePluginManager = getItemTypePluginManager( $self, $dbgLogger );
-\tassert( defined( $itemTypePluginManager ) );
-
-\tmy $timeBeforeTallying = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\tmy (
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayBeReferenced,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems
-\t) = $itemTypePluginManager->getItemTypeReferenceRelationships( $dbgLogger );
-
-\t$dbgLogger->print( sub {
-\t\treturn sprintf(
-\t\t\t"The following %u item types may be referenced by other items:\
\
\\t%s\
",
-\t\t\tscalar( @$itemTypesThatMayBeReferenced ),
-\t\t\tjoin( "\
\\t", @$itemTypesThatMayBeReferenced )
-\t\t);
-\t} );
-
-\t$dbgLogger->print( sub {
-\t\treturn sprintf(
-\t\t\t"The following %u item types may reference other items:\
\
\\t%s\
",
-\t\t\tscalar( @$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems ),
-\t\t\tjoin( "\
\\t", @$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems )
-\t\t);
-\t} );
-
-\tmy @namedItemTypes = $itemTypePluginManager->getAllNamedAndParsableItemTypes( $dbgLogger );
-
-\t$dbgLogger->print( sub {
-\t\treturn sprintf(
-\t\t\t"Instances of the following %u item types have names and are parsable:\
\
\\t%s\
",
-\t\t\tscalar( @namedItemTypes ),
-\t\t\tjoin( "\
\\t", @namedItemTypes )
-\t\t);
-\t} );
-
-\tmy ( $typeCountDict, $projectModuleCombosSeen ) = __tallyItemsOfTheseTypes(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t[
-\t\t\t@namedItemTypes,
-\t\t\t@$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t\t\t@$itemTypesThatMayBeReferenced
-\t\t],
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%projectModuleCombinationFilters
-\t);
-
-\tmy $totalNumberOfItemsSeen = List::Util::sum( 0, values( %$typeCountDict ) );
-
-\tmy $timeAfterTallying = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\tif ( ! $$instanceOptions{ \'noTiming\' } )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $duration = $timeAfterTallying - $timeBeforeTallying;
-\t\tif ( $duration < 0.0 ) { $duration = 0.0; }
-
-\t\tmy @itemTypes = sort( keys( %$typeCountDict ) );
-
-\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t"NOTE: %s Took %u.%03u seconds to tally %u items of %u types in %u project / module " .
-\t\t\t\t"combinations (%s).\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getPackageContextWithTimeStampString(),
-\t\t\t$duration,
-\t\t\t( $duration - int( $duration ) ) * 1000,
-\t\t\t$totalNumberOfItemsSeen,
-\t\t\tscalar( @itemTypes ),
-\t\t\tscalar( keys( %$projectModuleCombosSeen ) ),
-\t\t\tjoin( \', \', map { sprintf( \'%s: %u\', $_, $$typeCountDict{ $_ } ) } @itemTypes )
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\t## @todo Assert uniqueness of names within each module. From the standard docs:
-\t##
-\t## [...] there must not be another AXIS_PTS, MEASUREMENT, CHARACTERISTIC, BLOB or INSTANCE
-\t## object with an equal identifier in the same MODULE.
-\t## Furthermore it is not allowed to have a structure component with equal name in the MODULE.
-\t##
-\t## We will not worry about BLOB items or  structure components in this implementation.
-\t#__assertObjectNamesAreUnique( $self, $dbgLogger );
-
-\t# Typedefs have already been checked for uniqueness within their respective category
-\t# during the tallying phase, but we also must ensure uniqueness across all categories.
-\t__assertTypdefsAreUnique( $self, $dbgLogger, %projectModuleCombinationFilters );
-
-\tmy $timeAfterAssertingTypedefUniqueness = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\tif ( ! $$instanceOptions{ \'noTiming\' } )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $duration = $timeAfterAssertingTypedefUniqueness - $timeAfterTallying;
-\t\tif ( $duration < 0.0 ) { $duration = 0.0; }
-
-\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t"NOTE: %s Took %u.%03u seconds to assert uniqueness of typedefs in %u project / " .
-\t\t\t\t"module combinations.\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getPackageContextWithTimeStampString(),
-\t\t\t$duration,
-\t\t\t( $duration - int( $duration ) ) * 1000,
-\t\t\tscalar( keys( %$projectModuleCombosSeen ) )
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\t# If we have any CHARATERISTIC, AXIS_PTS or MEASUREMENT items that defined as instances
-\t# of a typedef, promote them now.
-\t__promoteTypedefedInstances( $self, $dbgLogger, %projectModuleCombinationFilters );
-
-\tmy $timeAfterPromotingTypedefedInstances = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\tif ( ! $$instanceOptions{ \'noTiming\' } )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $duration = $timeAfterPromotingTypedefedInstances - $timeAfterAssertingTypedefUniqueness;
-\t\tif ( $duration < 0.0 ) { $duration = 0.0; }
-
-\t\tmy $numberOfInstances = $$typeCountDict{ \'INSTANCE\' };
-
-\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t"NOTE: %s Took %u.%03u seconds to promote %u typdef\'ed INSTANCE items in %u project / " .
-\t\t\t\t"module combinations.\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getPackageContextWithTimeStampString(),
-\t\t\t$duration,
-\t\t\t( $duration - int( $duration ) ) * 1000,
-\t\t\tdefined( $numberOfInstances ) ? $numberOfInstances : 0,
-\t\t\tscalar( keys( %$projectModuleCombosSeen ) )
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\tmy %nullReferenceKeywordsTable = NULL_REFERENCE_KEYWORDS;
-
-\tmy %predefinedDataTypeLookupTable = A2L_Lib2::PredefinedDataTypes::makePredefinedDataTypeLookupTable(
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\tA2L_Lib2::Util::getLenientOptionsDict( $dbgLogger, %$instanceOptions )
-\t);
-
-\t__getItemReferences(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t\t\\%nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t\\%predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\tTRUE,
-\t\tA2L_Lib2::Subfields::ON_DEAD_REFERENCE_THROW,
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%projectModuleCombinationFilters
-\t);
-}
-
-sub __preprocessOptions($%)
-{
-\tmy ( $dbgLogger, %options ) = @_;
-
-\t## @todo Implement actual preprocessing here.
-\treturn %options;
-}
-
-sub __getRootElement
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\tmy $rootElement = $$self{ \'rootElement\' };
-\tassert( defined( $rootElement ) );
-
-\treturn $rootElement;
-}
-
-sub __moduleProjectComboWanted($$%)
-{
-\tmy ( $projectName, $moduleName, %projectModuleCombinationFilters ) = @_;
-
-\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $projectName ) );
-\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $moduleName ) );
-
-\tif ( ! keys( %projectModuleCombinationFilters ) )
-\t{
-\t\t# No desired combinations specified -> __all__ combinations match.
-\t\treturn TRUE;
-\t}
-
-\tmy $projectEntry = $projectModuleCombinationFilters{ $projectName };
-
-\tif ( ! defined( $projectEntry ) )
-\t{
-\t\treturn FALSE;
-\t}
-
-\tassert( ref( $projectEntry ) eq \'HASH\' );
-
-\treturn $$projectEntry{ $moduleName };
-}
-
-sub __beginErrorMessage
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $whileDoingWhat ) = @_;
-
-\treturn A2L_Lib2::Common::beginErrorMessage(
-\t\t$$self{ \'originalDocType\' },
-\t\t$whileDoingWhat
-\t);
-}
-
-sub __getMetaDataCacheForType
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $projectName, $moduleName, $type, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\tif ( StringFuncs::null( $projectName ) )
-\t{
-\t\tdie sprintf( "ERROR: [%s] No project name specified!\
", Context::getContext() );
-\t}
-
-\tif ( StringFuncs::null( $moduleName ) )
-\t{
-\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] No module name specified (project name was %s)!\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t$projectName
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\tmy $itemsByTypeDict = $$self{ \'itemsByType\' };
-\tassert( defined( $itemsByTypeDict ) && ref( $itemsByTypeDict ) eq \'HASH\' );
-
-\tmy $projectSpecificSubDict = $$itemsByTypeDict{ $projectName };
-
-\tif ( ! defined( $projectSpecificSubDict ) )
-\t{
-\t\t$projectSpecificSubDict = $$itemsByTypeDict{ $projectName } = {};
-\t}
-
-\tmy $moduleSpecificSubDict = $$projectSpecificSubDict{ $moduleName };
-
-\tif ( ! defined( $moduleSpecificSubDict ) )
-\t{
-\t\t$moduleSpecificSubDict = $$projectSpecificSubDict{ $moduleName } = {};
-\t}
-
-\tif ( StringFuncs::null( $type ) )
-\t{
-\t\treturn $moduleSpecificSubDict;
-\t}
-
-\tmy $typeDict = $$moduleSpecificSubDict{ $type };
-
-\tif ( ! defined( $typeDict ) )
-\t{
-\t\t$typeDict = $$moduleSpecificSubDict{ $type } = {};
-\t}
-
-\treturn $typeDict;
-}
-
-sub __walkTypeCacheForTheseProjectModuleCombos
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $visitorFunc, $dbgLogger, %projectModuleCombinationFilters ) = @_;
-
-\tmy $itemsByTypeDict = $$self{ \'itemsByType\' };
-\tassert( defined( $itemsByTypeDict ) );
-
-\tassert( ref( $visitorFunc ) eq \'CODE\' );
-
-\tforeach my $projectName ( sort( keys( %$itemsByTypeDict ) ) )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $moduleDict = $$itemsByTypeDict{ $projectName };
-\t\tassert( defined( $moduleDict ) );
-
-\t\tforeach my $moduleName ( sort( keys( %$moduleDict ) ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy $combinationWanted = __moduleProjectComboWanted(
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\t%projectModuleCombinationFilters
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\tif ( ! $combinationWanted )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\tmy $metaDataTypeDict = $$moduleDict{ $moduleName };
-\t\t\tassert( defined( $metaDataTypeDict ) );
-
-\t\t\tmy $continue = $visitorFunc->(
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\t$metaDataTypeDict,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\tif ( ! $continue )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\treturn;
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t}
-\t}
-}
-
-sub __walkDocumentForTheseProjectModuleCombos($$$$%)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$visitorFunc,
-\t\t$maxDepth,
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%projectModuleCombinationFilters
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tassert( defined( $visitorFunc ) );
-\tassert( ref( $visitorFunc ) eq \'CODE\' );
-
-\tmy $rootElement = __getRootElement( $self, $dbgLogger );
-
-\tmy $currentProjectName = \'\';
-\tmy $currentModuleName = \'\';
-
-\tmy %projectModuleCombosSeen = ();
-
-\tmy @nodesRemovedFromTree = A2L_Lib2::Util::forEachItem(
-
-\t\t# reference to element at which to begin top-down traversal
-\t\t$rootElement,
-
-\t\t# the function to invoke on each visited element
-\t\tsub {
-\t\t\tmy (
-\t\t\t\t$element,
-\t\t\t\t$parentOfCurrentElement,
-\t\t\t\t$currentDepth,
-\t\t\t\t$indexOfCurrentNodeInItsParentNodesChildList,
-\t\t\t\t$isLeafNode,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t) = @_;
-
-\t\t\tmy $elementType = $$element{ \'type\' };
-\t\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $elementType ) );
-
-\t\t\tmy $elementName = $$element{ \'name\' };
-
-\t\t\tmy $continueOverall = TRUE;
-\t\t\tmy $continueInThisTreeBranch = TRUE;
-\t\t\tmy $drop = FALSE;
-
-\t\t\tif ( $elementType eq \'PROJECT\' )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tassert( $currentDepth == 1 );
-\t\t\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $elementName ) );
-\t\t\t\t$currentProjectName = $elementName;
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t\telsif ( $elementType eq \'HEADER\' )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tassert( $currentDepth == 2 );
-\t\t\t\t# Ignore. HEADER items are direct children of the PROJECT node and contain no
-\t\t\t\t# information that is useful to us.
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t\telse
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $currentProjectName ) );
-\t\t\t\tassert( $currentDepth >= 2 );
-
-\t\t\t\tif ( $elementType eq \'MODULE\' )
-\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\tassert( $currentDepth == 2 );
-
-\t\t\t\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $elementName ) );
-\t\t\t\t\t$currentModuleName = $elementName;
-
-\t\t\t\t\t# If information about this particular project / module combo is not requested by
-\t\t\t\t\t# the caller, we won\'t descend deeper into this particular branch of the tree.
-\t\t\t\t\t$continueInThisTreeBranch = __moduleProjectComboWanted(
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$currentProjectName,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$currentModuleName,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t%projectModuleCombinationFilters
-\t\t\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t\t\tmy $projectModuleComboKey = $currentProjectName . \'/\' . $currentModuleName;
-\t\t\t\t\t$projectModuleCombosSeen{ $projectModuleComboKey } = undef;
-\t\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $currentModuleName ) );
-
-\t\t\t\tif ( $continueInThisTreeBranch )
-\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\t( $continueOverall, $continueInThisTreeBranch, $drop ) = $visitorFunc->(
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$currentProjectName,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$currentModuleName,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$element,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$parentOfCurrentElement,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$currentDepth,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$indexOfCurrentNodeInItsParentNodesChildList,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$isLeafNode,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t\t\t);
-\t\t\t\t}
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\treturn (
-\t\t\t\t\'continue\'       => $continueOverall,
-\t\t\t\t\'continueBranch\' => $continueInThisTreeBranch,
-\t\t\t\t\'drop\'           => $drop
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t},
-
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-
-\t\t# traversal options
-\t\t(
-\t\t\t\'minDepth\' => 1,
-\t\t\t\'maxDepth\' => $maxDepth
-\t\t)
-\t);
-
-\treturn ( \\%projectModuleCombosSeen, \\@nodesRemovedFromTree );
-}
-
-sub __tallyItemsOfTheseTypes($$$%)
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $typesToTally, $dbgLogger, %projectModuleCombinationFilters ) = @_;
-
-\tmy %itemTally = map { $_ => 0 } @$typesToTally;
-
-\tmy ( $projectModuleCombosSeen, $nodesRemoved ) = __walkDocumentForTheseProjectModuleCombos(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\tsub {
-\t\t\tmy (
-\t\t\t\t$currentProjectName,
-\t\t\t\t$currentModuleName,
-\t\t\t\t$element,
-\t\t\t\t$parentOfCurrentElement,
-\t\t\t\t$currentDepth,
-\t\t\t\t$indexOfCurrentNodeInItsParentNodesChildList,
-\t\t\t\t$isLeafNode,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t) = @_;
-
-\t\t\t## @todo Enforce namespace as defined by the standard!
-
-\t\t\tmy $elementType = $$element{ \'type\' };
-\t\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $elementType ) );
-
-\t\t\tif ( ! exists( $itemTally{ $elementType } ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t# Items of this type should not be tallied.
-\t\t\t\tassert( $elementType ne \'MODULE\' );
-\t\t\t\treturn ( TRUE, TRUE, FALSE );
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\tmy $elementName = $$element{ \'name\' };
-
-\t\t\tmy $cacheStorageKey = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::determineItemKey( $element, $dbgLogger_ );
-
-\t\t\tmy $metaDataCacheForThisType = __getMetaDataCacheForType(
-\t\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t\t$currentProjectName,
-\t\t\t\t$currentModuleName,
-\t\t\t\t$elementType,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t\tassert( defined( $metaDataCacheForThisType ) );
-
-\t\t\tmy $existingMetaDataEntry = $$metaDataCacheForThisType{ $cacheStorageKey };
-
-\t\t\tif ( defined( $existingMetaDataEntry ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tmy $existingElement = $$existingMetaDataEntry{ \'element\' };
-
-\t\t\t\tmy $firstDefInLine = $$existingElement{ \'startsInLine\' };
-\t\t\t\tmy $thisDefInLine = $$element{ \'startsInLine\' };
-
-\t\t\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $firstDefInLine ) );
-\t\t\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $thisDefInLine ) );
-
-\t\t\t\t## @todo We need to respect the namespace rules defined by the standard!
-\t\t\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t\t\t"%s Project %s / module %s contains multiple %s items with key %s! First " .
-\t\t\t\t\t\t"definition in line %u, current definition in line %u.\
",
-\t\t\t\t\t__beginErrorMessage( $self, sprintf( \'tallying %s items\', $elementType ) ),
-\t\t\t\t\t$currentProjectName,
-\t\t\t\t\t$currentModuleName,
-\t\t\t\t\t$elementType,
-\t\t\t\t\t$cacheStorageKey,
-\t\t\t\t\t$firstDefInLine,
-\t\t\t\t\t$thisDefInLine
-\t\t\t\t);
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t$$metaDataCacheForThisType{ $cacheStorageKey } = {
-\t\t\t\t\'element\'       => $element,
-\t\t\t\t\'depth\'         => $currentDepth,
-\t\t\t\t\'parentElement\' => $parentOfCurrentElement
-\t\t\t};
-
-\t\t\t++$itemTally{ $elementType };
-
-\t\t\treturn ( TRUE, TRUE, FALSE );
-\t\t},
-\t\tundef,
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%projectModuleCombinationFilters
-\t);
-
-\tforeach my $itemType ( keys( %itemTally ) )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $typeCount = $itemTally{ $itemType };
-
-\t\tif ( $typeCount == 0 )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tdelete $itemTally{ $itemType };
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\tassert( ! @$nodesRemoved );
-
-\treturn ( \\%itemTally, $projectModuleCombosSeen );
-}
-
-sub __assertTypdefsAreUnique($$%)
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $dbgLogger, %projectModuleCombinationFilters ) = @_;
-
-\t__walkTypeCacheForTheseProjectModuleCombos(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\tsub {
-\t\t\tmy ( $projectName, $moduleName, $metaDataTypeDict, $dbgLogger_ ) = @_;
-
-\t\t\t__assertTypdefsAreUniqueInThisModule( $self, $projectName, $moduleName, $dbgLogger_ );
-\t\t\treturn TRUE;
-\t\t},
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%projectModuleCombinationFilters
-\t);
-}
-
-sub __assertTypdefsAreUniqueInThisModule
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $projectName, $moduleName, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\tmy %typedefInfo = TYPEDEF_INFO;
-
-\tmy @typedefTypes = sort( keys( %typedefInfo ) );
-
-\tmy %combosAlreadyChecked = ();
-
-\tforeach my $typedefType ( @typedefTypes )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $typedefsOfThisCategory = __getMetaDataCacheForType(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$typedefType,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $typedefsOfThisCategory ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t# Got no typedefs of this kind at all.
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tmy @otherTypedefCategories = grep { $_ ne $typedefType } @typedefTypes;
-\t\tassert( scalar( @otherTypedefCategories ) == scalar( @typedefTypes ) - 1 );
-
-\t\tforeach my $otherTypedefCategory ( @otherTypedefCategories )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy $comboKey = join( \'-\', sort( $typedefType, $otherTypedefCategory ) );
-
-\t\t\tif ( exists( $combosAlreadyChecked{ $comboKey } ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t# This combination has already been checked.
-\t\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t# Mark this combination as checked so we won\'t needlessly do it again.
-\t\t\t$combosAlreadyChecked{ $comboKey } = undef;
-
-\t\t\tmy $typedefsOfOtherCategory = __getMetaDataCacheForType(
-\t\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\t$otherTypedefCategory,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\tif ( ! defined( $typedefsOfOtherCategory ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t# Got no typedefs of this kind at all.
-\t\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t__assertUniquenessAcrossTheseTypedefCategories(
-\t\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\t$typedefType,
-\t\t\t\t$typedefsOfThisCategory,
-\t\t\t\t$otherTypedefCategory,
-\t\t\t\t$typedefsOfOtherCategory,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t}
-\t}
-}
-
-sub __assertUniquenessAcrossTheseTypedefCategories
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$typedefType,
-\t\t$typedefsOfThisCategory,
-\t\t$otherTypedefCategory,
-\t\t$typedefsOfOtherCategory,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\t__assertTypedefsOnlyInFirstCategory(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$typedefType,
-\t\t$typedefsOfThisCategory,
-\t\t$otherTypedefCategory,
-\t\t$typedefsOfOtherCategory,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\t__assertTypedefsOnlyInFirstCategory(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$otherTypedefCategory,
-\t\t$typedefsOfOtherCategory,
-\t\t$typedefType,
-\t\t$typedefsOfThisCategory,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-}
-
-sub __assertTypedefsOnlyInFirstCategory
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$firstTypedefCategoryName,
-\t\t$firstTypedefDict,
-\t\t$secondTypedefCategoryName,
-\t\t$secondTypedefDict,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tforeach my $thisTypedefName ( sort( keys( %$firstTypedefDict ) ) )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $entryInSecondCategory = $$secondTypedefDict{ $thisTypedefName };
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $entryInSecondCategory ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tmy $entryInFirstCagory = $$firstTypedefDict{ $thisTypedefName };
-\t\tmy $firstTypedefItem = $$entryInFirstCagory{ \'element\' };
-\t\tassert( defined( $firstTypedefItem ) );
-
-\t\tmy $firstItemDefinedInLine = $$firstTypedefItem{ \'startsInLine\' };
-\t\tassert( defined( $firstItemDefinedInLine ) );
-
-\t\tmy $secondTypedefItem = $$entryInSecondCategory{ \'element\' };
-\t\tassert( defined( $secondTypedefItem ) );
-
-\t\tmy $secondItemDefinedInLine = $$secondTypedefItem{ \'startsInLine\' };
-\t\tassert( defined( $secondItemDefinedInLine ) );
-
-\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t"%s Project %s / module %s contains clashing TYPEDEF_* items! An item named %s exists " .
-\t\t\t\t"both as a %s and as a %s (definitions in lines %u and %u respectively)!\
",
-\t\t\t__beginErrorMessage( $self, \'checking uniqueness of typedefs\' ),
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$thisTypedefName,
-\t\t\t$firstTypedefCategoryName,
-\t\t\t$secondTypedefCategoryName,
-\t\t\t$firstItemDefinedInLine,
-\t\t\t$secondItemDefinedInLine
-\t\t);
-\t}
-}
-
-sub __promoteTypedefedInstances($$%)
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $dbgLogger, %projectModuleCombinationFilters ) = @_;
-
-\t__walkTypeCacheForTheseProjectModuleCombos(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\tsub {
-\t\t\tmy ( $projectName, $moduleName, $metaDataTypeDict, $dbgLogger_ ) = @_;
-
-\t\t\tmy $dictOfInstances = $$metaDataTypeDict{ \'INSTANCE\' };
-
-\t\t\tif ( ! defined( $dictOfInstances ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t# A2L document does not contain any objects of type INSTANCE in this module.
-\t\t\t\treturn TRUE;
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t__promoteTypedefedInstancesForThisModule(
-\t\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\t$dictOfInstances,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\treturn TRUE;
-\t\t},
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%projectModuleCombinationFilters
-\t);
-}
-
-sub __promoteTypedefedInstancesForThisModule
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $projectName, $moduleName, $dictOfInstances, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\tforeach my $instanceName ( sort( keys( %$dictOfInstances ) ) )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $instanceMetaData = $$dictOfInstances{ $instanceName };
-\t\tassert( defined( $instanceMetaData ) );
-
-\t\t__promoteThisTypedefedInstance(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$instanceName,
-\t\t\t$instanceMetaData,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-\t}
-}
-
-sub __promoteThisTypedefedInstance
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $projectName, $moduleName, $instanceName, $instanceMetaData, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\tmy $instanceItem = $$instanceMetaData{ \'element\' };
-\tassert( defined( $instanceItem ) );
-
-\tassert( $$instanceItem{ \'parsed\' } );
-
-\tmy $elementData = $$instanceItem{ \'data\' };
-\tassert( defined( $elementData ) );
-\tmy $fixedPositionFieldsSubDict = $$elementData{ \'fixedPositionFields\' };
-\tassert( defined( $fixedPositionFieldsSubDict ) );
-
-\tmy $nameOfTypedef = $$fixedPositionFieldsSubDict{ \'TypedefName\' };
-\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $nameOfTypedef ) );
-
-\tmy %typedefInfo = TYPEDEF_INFO;
-
-\tforeach my $typedefType ( sort( keys( %typedefInfo ) ) )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $typedefsOfThisCategory = __getMetaDataCacheForType(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$typedefType,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $typedefsOfThisCategory ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t# Got no typedefs of this kind at all, so this instance cannot refer to such a typedef.
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tmy $typeDefMetaData = $$typedefsOfThisCategory{ $nameOfTypedef };
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $typeDefMetaData ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t# No such typedef exists in this category.
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\t# This instance references a typedef in the $typedefType category. The instance must
-\t\t# be added to the corresponding item category. For example, an instance defined using a
-\t\t# TYPEDEF_MEASUREMENT must be stored as a MEASUREMENT
-\t\tmy $concreteItemTypeCorrespondingToThisTypedefCategory = $typedefInfo{ $typedefType };
-\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $concreteItemTypeCorrespondingToThisTypedefCategory ) );
-
-\t\tmy $copyItemToThisCategory = __getMetaDataCacheForType(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$concreteItemTypeCorrespondingToThisTypedefCategory,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-
-\t\tassert( defined( $copyItemToThisCategory ) );
-
-\t\tmy $existingEntry = $$copyItemToThisCategory{ $instanceName };
-
-\t\tif ( defined( $existingEntry ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy $existingElement = $$existingEntry{ \'element\' };
-\t\t\tassert( defined( $existingElement ) );
-
-\t\t\tmy $firstDefInLine = $$existingElement{ \'startsInLine\' };
-\t\t\tmy $thisDefInLine = $$instanceItem{ \'startsInLine\' };
-
-\t\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $firstDefInLine ) );
-\t\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $thisDefInLine ) );
-
-\t\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t\t"%s Project %s / module %s contains an INSTANCE item %s that clashes with " .
-\t\t\t\t\t"existing %s %s! INSTANCE %s defined in line %u, %s %s defined in line %u.\
",
-\t\t\t\t__beginErrorMessage( \'resolving instance typedefs\' ),
-\t\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\t$instanceName,
-\t\t\t\t$concreteItemTypeCorrespondingToThisTypedefCategory,
-\t\t\t\t$instanceName,
-\t\t\t\t$thisDefInLine,
-\t\t\t\t$instanceName,
-\t\t\t\t$concreteItemTypeCorrespondingToThisTypedefCategory,
-\t\t\t\t$instanceName,
-\t\t\t\t$firstDefInLine
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t}
-
-\t\t# Promote the instance to the type it defines but clearly mark it as an item that has been
-\t\t# defined via a typedef (the fact that the entry has typedef and instance keys shows that).
-\t\t$$copyItemToThisCategory{ $instanceName } = {
-\t\t\t\'element\'          => $instanceItem,
-\t\t\t\'typedefMetaData\'  => $typeDefMetaData,
-\t\t\t\'instanceMetaData\' => $instanceMetaData
-\t\t};
-
-\t\treturn;
-\t}
-
-\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t"%s Project %s / module %s contains an INSTANCE item %s (defined in line %u ) that " .
-\t\t\t"references a TYPEDEF_* item named %s, but no such item exists anywhere in this " .
-\t\t\t"project / module!\
",
-\t\t__beginErrorMessage( $self, \'resolving typedefed instances\' ),
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$instanceName,
-\t\t$$instanceItem{ \'startsInLine\' },
-\t\t$nameOfTypedef
-\t);
-}
-
-sub __getExcludedCalibratableObjectsToRemove
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$calibratableObjectTypes,
-\t\t$itemExcluder,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tmy @toRemove = ();
-
-\tforeach my $calibratableObjectType ( @$calibratableObjectTypes )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $itemsOfThisCategory = __getMetaDataCacheForType(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$calibratableObjectType,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-\t\tassert( defined( $itemsOfThisCategory ) );
-
-\t\tforeach my $itemKey ( sort( keys( %$itemsOfThisCategory ) ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $itemKey ) );
-
-\t\t\tmy $itemMetaData = $$itemsOfThisCategory{ $itemKey };
-\t\t\tassert( defined( $itemMetaData ) );
-
-\t\t\tmy $element = $$itemMetaData{ \'element\' };
-\t\t\tassert( defined( $element ) );
-
-\t\t\tmy $itemName = $$element{ \'name\' };
-
-\t\t\tif ( StringFuncs::null( $itemName ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t# Not a named item type. Whitelist cannot possibly be applied to this at all.
-\t\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\tmy $itemIsExcluded = A2L_Lib2::ItemExcluder::excludesItem(
-\t\t\t\t$itemExcluder,
-\t\t\t\t$itemName,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger->printf(
-\t\t\t\t\'Item excluder %s %s %s.\',
-\t\t\t\t$itemIsExcluded ?  \'excludes\' : \'does not exclude\',
-\t\t\t\t$$element{ \'type\' },
-\t\t\t\t$itemName
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\tif ( $itemIsExcluded )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tpush( @toRemove, $itemMetaData );
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\treturn @toRemove;
-}
-
-sub __deleteItemFromMetaDataCache
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $projectName, $moduleName, $element, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\tmy $elementType = $$element{ \'type\' };
-\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $elementType ) );
-
-\tmy $itemsOfThisType = __getMetaDataCacheForType(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$elementType,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-\tassert( defined( $itemsOfThisType ) );
-
-\t# Remove the element\'s meta data from our type cache.
-\tmy $itemKey = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::determineItemKey( $element, $dbgLogger );
-\tdelete $$itemsOfThisType{ $itemKey };
-}
-
-# Returns a list containing all direct and indirect children of the specified node.
-sub __getAllDirectAndIndirectChildren($$)
-{
-\tmy ( $ofThisElement, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\tmy @directAndIndirectChildren = ();
-
-\tmy @nodesRemovedFromTree = A2L_Lib2::Util::forEachItem(
-
-\t\t# reference to element at which to begin top-down traversal
-\t\t$ofThisElement,
-
-\t\t# the function to invoke on each visited element
-\t\tsub {
-\t\t\tmy (
-\t\t\t\t$element,
-\t\t\t\t$parentOfCurrentElement,
-\t\t\t\t$currentDepth,
-\t\t\t\t$indexOfCurrentNodeInItsParentNodesChildList,
-\t\t\t\t$isLeafNode,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t) = @_;
-
-\t\t\tpush( @directAndIndirectChildren, $element );
-
-\t\t\treturn (
-\t\t\t\t\'continue\'       => TRUE,
-\t\t\t\t\'continueBranch\' => TRUE
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t},
-
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-
-\t\t# traversal options
-\t\t(
-\t\t\t\'minDepth\' => 1,    # <- begin traversal at one level below the root node
-\t\t\t\'maxDepth\' => undef # <- no max. depth limit
-\t\t)
-\t);
-
-\tassert( ! @nodesRemovedFromTree );
-
-\treturn @directAndIndirectChildren;
-}
-
-# Removes the specified elements from the meta data item cache and unlinks them from the document
-# tree.
-#
-# Does not return anything.
-sub __removeTheseElementsFromThisModule($$$$$$$)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$metaDataOfItemsToRemove,
-\t\t$suppressInfoPrintout,
-\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tmy $instanceOptions = $$self{ \'options\' };
-\tassert( defined( $instanceOptions ) );
-
-\tmy $timeAtStart = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\tmy @allItemsToRemoveFromMetaDataCache = ();
-
-\t## @todo Move loop body out into separate subroutine.
-\tfor ( my $i = 0; $i < @$metaDataOfItemsToRemove; ++$i )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $itemMetaData = $$metaDataOfItemsToRemove[ $i ];
-\t\tmy $element = $$itemMetaData{ \'element\' };
-\t\tassert( defined( $element ) );
-
-\t\tmy $instanceMetaData = $$itemMetaData{ \'instanceMetaData\' };
-\t\tmy $typedefMetaData = $$itemMetaData{ \'typedefMetaData\' };
-
-\t\tif ( defined( $instanceMetaData ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tassert( defined( $typedefMetaData ) );
-
-\t\t\t# This item is defined via an INSTANCE / TYPEDEF_* combination. Remove the INSTANCE
-\t\t\t# element the item was promoted from.
-\t\t\tpush( @$metaDataOfItemsToRemove, $instanceMetaData );
-\t\t\tpush( @allItemsToRemoveFromMetaDataCache, $$instanceMetaData{ \'element\' } );
-\t\t}
-\t\telse
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tassert( ! defined( $typedefMetaData ) );
-\t\t}
-
-\t\t# Unlinking this element from our tree effectively also removes any of its child elements
-\t\t# (both direct and indirect children!) from the tree. For obvious reasons, these also need
-\t\t# to be removed from our meta data cache.
-\t\tmy @directAndIndirectChildren = __getAllDirectAndIndirectChildren( $element, $dbgLogger );
-\t\tpush( @allItemsToRemoveFromMetaDataCache, $element );
-\t\tpush( @allItemsToRemoveFromMetaDataCache, @directAndIndirectChildren );
-
-\t\t# Now unlink the actual element from the document tree.
-\t\tmy $parentElement = $$itemMetaData{ \'parentElement\' };
-\t\tassert( defined( $parentElement ) );
-
-\t\tmy $childListOfParent = $$parentElement{ \'children\' };
-\t\tassert( defined( $childListOfParent ) );
-
-\t\tmy $indexInParent = List::MoreUtils::firstidx { $_ == $element } @$childListOfParent;
-
-\t\tif ( $indexInParent < 0 )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger->print( sub {
-
-\t\t\t\tmy $itemKeyOfParent = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::determineItemKey( $parentElement, $dbgLogger );
-\t\t\t\tmy $itemTypeOfParent = $$parentElement{ \'type\' };
-
-\t\t\t\treturn sprintf(
-\t\t\t\t\t"Cannot unlink %s %s from child list of %s %s. The node from which to " .
-\t\t\t\t\t\t"remove the child has no such child. Child list contains %u nodes:\
\
\\t\\%s\
",
-\t\t\t\t\tA2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::itemTypeToString( $$element{ \'type\' } ),
-\t\t\t\t\tA2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::determineItemKey( $element, $dbgLogger ),
-\t\t\t\t\tA2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::itemTypeToString( $itemTypeOfParent ),
-\t\t\t\t\t$itemKeyOfParent,
-\t\t\t\t\tscalar( @$childListOfParent ),
-\t\t\t\t\tjoin( "\
\\t", map {
-\t\t\t\t\t\tsprintf(
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\'%s %s\',
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\tA2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::itemTypeToString( $$_{ \'type\' } ),
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\tA2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::determineItemKey( $_, $dbgLogger )
-\t\t\t\t\t\t)
-\t\t\t\t\t} @$childListOfParent )
-\t\t\t\t);
-\t\t\t} );
-
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tsplice( @$childListOfParent, $indexInParent, 1 );
-\t}
-
-\tmy %deduplicatedItemsToRemoveFromMetaDataCache = map { $_ => $_ } @allItemsToRemoveFromMetaDataCache;
-\t@allItemsToRemoveFromMetaDataCache = values( %deduplicatedItemsToRemoveFromMetaDataCache );
-
-\tforeach my $elementToRemoveFromMetaDataCache ( @allItemsToRemoveFromMetaDataCache )
-\t{
-\t\t__deleteItemFromMetaDataCache(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$elementToRemoveFromMetaDataCache,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\t# When removing unreferenced items, we also need to update our reference cache. After all,
-\t# the items we just removed may have held references to other items.
-\t__unregisterRemovedItemsFromReferenceDict(
-\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule,
-\t\t\\@allItemsToRemoveFromMetaDataCache,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy $timeAfterRemovingItems = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\tif ( ! $$instanceOptions{ \'noTiming\' } && ! $suppressInfoPrintout )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $duration = $timeAfterRemovingItems - $timeAtStart;
-\t\tif ( $duration < 0.0 ) { $duration = 0.0; }
-
-\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t"NOTE: %s Took %u.%03u seconds to remove %u items from project %s / module %s.\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getPackageContextWithTimeStampString(),
-\t\t\t$duration,
-\t\t\t( $duration - int( $duration ) ) * 1000,
-\t\t\tscalar( @$metaDataOfItemsToRemove ),
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t);
-\t}
-}
-
-# Removes all dead references (i.e. references that refer to non-existent items) from the specified
-# module. Returns the following:
-#
-# 0) number of dead references removed
-#
-# 1) total number of references in the module overall
-#
-# 2) number of items that had to be dropped from this module because they contained dead, non-
-#    nullable references. If $allowRemovalOfNonNullableReferences was passed as false, this will
-#    always be 0.
-sub __removeDeadReferences($$$$$$$$$$)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$referencesInThisModule,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t\t$nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t$predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\t$metaDataTypeDictForModule,
-\t\t$allowRemovalOfNonNullableReferences,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tassert( defined( $referencesInThisModule ) );
-
-\tmy $totalNumberOfDeadReferences = 0;
-\tmy $totalNumberOfReferencesOverall = 0;
-\tmy $numberOfItemsDropped = 0;
-
-\tforeach my $itemType ( sort( keys( %$referencesInThisModule ) ) )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $referencesOfThisType = $$referencesInThisModule{ $itemType };
-
-\t\tforeach my $itemKey ( sort( keys( %$referencesOfThisType ) ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy $listOfReferenceSubfieldInstancesHeldByThisItem = $$referencesOfThisType{ $itemKey };
-
-\t\t\t# If, after removing dead references, a ReferenceSubfield instance no longer has any
-\t\t\t# references left, we\'re going to remove it entirely. For that purpose, we\'re keeping
-\t\t\t# track of the indices of such ReferenceSubfield instances here for easy deletion
-\t\t\t# later on.
-\t\t\tmy $numberOfReferenceSubfieldInstancesToDrop = 0;
-\t\t\tmy $removeWholeItem = FALSE;
-
-\t\t\tfor ( my $i = 0; $i < @$listOfReferenceSubfieldInstancesHeldByThisItem; ++$i )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tmy $referenceSubfieldInstance = $$listOfReferenceSubfieldInstancesHeldByThisItem[ $i ];
-
-\t\t\t\tmy (
-\t\t\t\t\t$needToDeleteEntireItem,
-\t\t\t\t\t$referencesRemainingInThisSubfield,
-\t\t\t\t\t$referencesDeletedFromSubfield
-\t\t\t\t) = A2L_Lib2::ReferenceSubfield::removeDeadReferences(
-\t\t\t\t\t$referenceSubfieldInstance,
-\t\t\t\t\t$metaDataTypeDictForModule,
-\t\t\t\t\t$allowRemovalOfNonNullableReferences,
-\t\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t\tif ( $needToDeleteEntireItem )
-\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\tassert(
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$allowRemovalOfNonNullableReferences,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\'Should never reach this line if dropping items with non-nullable dead \' .
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\'refs is not enabled!\'
-\t\t\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t\t\t# This reference subfield contains a non-nullable, unremovable dead reference ->
-\t\t\t\t\t# since the reference itself cannot be reset, the entire item that contains the
-\t\t\t\t\t# reference must be deleted. Otherwise we\'d leave a broken item in the A2L.
-\t\t\t\t\t$removeWholeItem = TRUE;
-\t\t\t\t\t++$numberOfItemsDropped;
-\t\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t\tassert( $referencesRemainingInThisSubfield >= 0 );
-\t\t\t\tassert( $referencesDeletedFromSubfield >= 0 );
-
-\t\t\t\t$totalNumberOfDeadReferences += $referencesDeletedFromSubfield;
-
-\t\t\t\tmy $totalRefsInSubfield = $referencesRemainingInThisSubfield + $referencesDeletedFromSubfield;
-
-\t\t\t\t$totalNumberOfReferencesOverall += $totalRefsInSubfield;
-
-\t\t\t\tif ( $referencesRemainingInThisSubfield == 0 )
-\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\t# Subfield no longer has any references. Get rid of the entire ReferenceSubfield
-\t\t\t\t\t# instance.
-\t\t\t\t\t++$numberOfReferenceSubfieldInstancesToDrop;
-
-\t\t\t\t\t$$listOfReferenceSubfieldInstancesHeldByThisItem[ $i ] = undef;
-\t\t\t\t}
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\tif ( $removeWholeItem )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tdelete $$referencesOfThisType{ $itemKey };
-
-\t\t\t\tmy $itemsOfThisTypeInModule = $$metaDataTypeDictForModule{ $itemType };
-\t\t\t\tassert( defined( $itemsOfThisTypeInModule ) );
-\t\t\t\tmy $metaDataForThisItem = $$itemsOfThisTypeInModule{ $itemKey };
-\t\t\t\tassert( defined( $metaDataForThisItem ) );
-
-\t\t\t\t__removeTheseElementsFromThisModule(
-\t\t\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\t\t[ $metaDataForThisItem ],
-\t\t\t\t\tTRUE,
-\t\t\t\t\t$referencesInThisModule,
-\t\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t\t);
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t\telsif ( $numberOfReferenceSubfieldInstancesToDrop )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t# At least one ReferenceSubfield instance should be dropped. Remove any entries
-\t\t\t\t# marked for removal (from our internal reference lookup cache).
-\t\t\t\t@$listOfReferenceSubfieldInstancesHeldByThisItem = grep { defined( $_ ) } @$listOfReferenceSubfieldInstancesHeldByThisItem;
-
-\t\t\t\t# If the list is empty after this, just remove the entire dictionary entry.
-\t\t\t\tif ( ! @$listOfReferenceSubfieldInstancesHeldByThisItem )
-\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\tdelete $$referencesOfThisType{ $itemKey };
-\t\t\t\t}
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\treturn ( $totalNumberOfDeadReferences, $totalNumberOfReferencesOverall, $numberOfItemsDropped );
-}
-
-# Traverses the specified module in bottom-up mode and keeps removing the bottommost empty or
-# incomplete nodes until no empty / incomplete nodes remain in the module. Returns the following:
-#
-# 0) Reference to a list containing references to all nodes that were removed because they were
-#    empty.
-#
-# 1) Reference to a list containing references to all nodes that were removed because they were
-#    incomplete.
-sub __removeBottommostEmptyAndIncompleteItems($$$$$$)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$printWarnings,
-\t\t$anyItemsDroppedDueToDeadNonNullableRefs,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tmy $itemTypePluginManager = getItemTypePluginManager( $self, $dbgLogger );
-
-\tmy %isEmptyFuncsForAllTypes = A2L_Lib2::ItemTypePluginManager::getLookupTable(
-\t\t$itemTypePluginManager,
-\t\t\'isEmptyFunc\',
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy %isCompleteFuncsForAllTypes = A2L_Lib2::ItemTypePluginManager::getLookupTable(
-\t\t$itemTypePluginManager,
-\t\t\'isCompleteFunc\',
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy @corruptNodesMarkedForRemoval = ();
-\tmy @emptyNodesMarkedForRemoval = ();
-
-\tmy ( $projectModuleCombosSeen, $nodesRemoved ) = __walkDocumentForTheseProjectModuleCombos(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\tsub {
-\t\t\tmy (
-\t\t\t\t$currentProjectName,
-\t\t\t\t$currentModuleName,
-\t\t\t\t$element,
-\t\t\t\t$parentOfCurrentElement,
-\t\t\t\t$currentDepth,
-\t\t\t\t$indexOfCurrentNodeInItsParentNodesChildList,
-\t\t\t\t$isLeafNode,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t) = @_;
-
-\t\t\tif ( ! $isLeafNode )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\treturn ( TRUE, TRUE, FALSE );
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\tmy $itemType = $$element{ \'type\' };
-\t\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $itemType ) );
-
-\t\t\tmy $isEmptyFuncForThisType = $isEmptyFuncsForAllTypes{ $itemType };
-
-\t\t\tif ( ! defined( $isEmptyFuncForThisType ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t# Plugin does not provide a method to check if item is empty -> assume it\'s NOT empty.
-\t\t\t\treturn ( TRUE, FALSE, FALSE );
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\tmy $itemKey = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::determineItemKey( $element, $dbgLogger_ );
-
-\t\t\tmy $itemShouldBeRemoved = FALSE;
-
-\t\t\tmy $isEmpty = __determineIfElementIsEmpty(
-\t\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t\t$itemKey,
-\t\t\t\t$element,
-\t\t\t\t$isEmptyFuncForThisType,
-\t\t\t\t$currentProjectName,
-\t\t\t\t$currentModuleName,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\tif ( $isEmpty )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tpush( @emptyNodesMarkedForRemoval, $element );
-\t\t\t\t$itemShouldBeRemoved = TRUE;
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t\t# We only need to perform this extra work if at least one item was dropped due to
-\t\t\t# dead, non-nullable references.
-\t\t\telsif ( $anyItemsDroppedDueToDeadNonNullableRefs )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t$itemShouldBeRemoved = __determineIfElementIsIncomplete(
-\t\t\t\t\t$itemTypePluginManager,
-\t\t\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t\t\t$itemKey,
-\t\t\t\t\t$element,
-\t\t\t\t\t$isCompleteFuncsForAllTypes{ $itemType },
-\t\t\t\t\t$currentProjectName,
-\t\t\t\t\t$currentModuleName,
-\t\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t\tif ( $itemShouldBeRemoved )
-\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\tpush( @corruptNodesMarkedForRemoval, $element );
-\t\t\t\t}
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\treturn ( TRUE, FALSE, $itemShouldBeRemoved );
-\t\t},
-\t\tundef,
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t( $projectName => { $moduleName => TRUE() } )
-\t);
-
-\tassert( scalar( @$nodesRemoved ) == scalar( @emptyNodesMarkedForRemoval ) +
-\t\tscalar( @corruptNodesMarkedForRemoval ) );
-
-\tmy $metaDataCacheForThisModule = __getMetaDataCacheForType(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\tundef,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-\tassert( defined( $metaDataCacheForThisModule ) );
-
-\t# Each element we removed from the tree must also be removed from our meta data cache.
-\tforeach my $removedElement ( @$nodesRemoved )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $itemType = $$removedElement{ \'type\' };
-\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $itemType ) );
-
-\t\tmy $metaDataForThisItemType = $$metaDataCacheForThisModule{ $itemType };
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $metaDataForThisItemType ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t# The item we removed the tree is not one we keep meta data about.
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tmy $itemKey = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::determineItemKey( $removedElement, $dbgLogger );
-
-\t\tdelete $$metaDataForThisItemType{ $itemKey };
-\t}
-
-\treturn ( \\@emptyNodesMarkedForRemoval, \\@corruptNodesMarkedForRemoval );
-}
-
-sub __getMetaDataOfUnreferencedItems($$$$$$$)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatAreReferenceable,
-\t\t$primaryReferenceItemTypes,
-\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tmy $metaDataCacheForThisModule = __getMetaDataCacheForType(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\tundef,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-\tassert( defined( $metaDataCacheForThisModule ) );
-
-\tmy $itemTypePluginManager = getItemTypePluginManager( $self, $dbgLogger );
-
-\tmy (
-\t\tundef,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems
-\t) = A2L_Lib2::ItemTypePluginManager::getItemTypeReferenceRelationships(
-\t\t$itemTypePluginManager,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy $generalMetaDataCache = __getMetaDataCacheForType(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\tundef,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-\tassert( defined( $generalMetaDataCache ) );
-
-\tmy @metaDataOfUnreferencedItems = __getMetaDataOfItemsNotReferencedByThese(
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$generalMetaDataCache,
-\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatAreReferenceable,
-\t\t$primaryReferenceItemTypes,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\t$dbgLogger->print( sub {
-
-\t\tif ( ! @metaDataOfUnreferencedItems )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\treturn \'No items are unreferenced.\';
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tmy $message = sprintf(
-\t\t\t"The following %u items are unreferenced:\
\
",
-\t\t\tscalar( @metaDataOfUnreferencedItems )
-\t\t);
-
-\t\tforeach my $metaDataOfUnreferencedItem ( @metaDataOfUnreferencedItems )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy $element = $$metaDataOfUnreferencedItem{ \'element\' };
-\t\t\tmy $itemType = $$element{ \'type\' };
-
-\t\t\tmy $thisItemKey = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::determineItemKey( $element, $dbgLogger );
-
-\t\t\t$message .= sprintf( "\\t%s %s\
", $itemType, $thisItemKey );
-\t\t}
-
-\t\treturn $message;
-\t} );
-
-\treturn @metaDataOfUnreferencedItems;
-}
-
-sub __getMetaDataOfItemsNotReferencedByThese($$$$$$$)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$generalMetaDataCache,
-\t\t$byTheseItemReferences,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatAreReferenceable,
-\t\t$primaryReferenceItemTypes,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\t# 1st step: collect all item type / name combinations that may match the specified item
-\t# references.
-\tmy %allPotentialReferenceMatches = ();
-
-\tforeach my $itemTypeThatMayReferenceOtherItems ( keys( %$byTheseItemReferences ) )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $refMetaInfoSubdict = $$byTheseItemReferences{ $itemTypeThatMayReferenceOtherItems };
-
-\t\tforeach my $itemKey ( keys( %$refMetaInfoSubdict ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy $referenceSubfieldInstances = $$refMetaInfoSubdict{ $itemKey };
-
-\t\t\tforeach my $subfieldInstance ( @$referenceSubfieldInstances )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tmy @references = A2L_Lib2::ReferenceSubfield::getItemReferenceInstances(
-\t\t\t\t\t$subfieldInstance
-\t\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t\tforeach my $itemReferenceInstance ( @references )
-\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\tif ( ! A2L_Lib2::ItemReference::hasBeenResolved( $itemReferenceInstance ) )
-\t\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# This reference could not be resolved.
-\t\t\t\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t\t\tA2L_Lib2::ItemReference::storeAllPossibleMatches(
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$itemReferenceInstance,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\\%allPotentialReferenceMatches,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t\t\t);
-\t\t\t\t}
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\t# 2nd step: collect all referenceable items that do not match any of the type / name
-\t# combinations collected in step 1.
-\tmy @metaDataOfItemsNotReferencedByAny = ();
-
-\tforeach my $referenceableObjectType ( @$itemTypesThatAreReferenceable )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $itemsOfThisReferenceableType = $$generalMetaDataCache{ $referenceableObjectType };
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $itemsOfThisReferenceableType ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t# We do not have any items of this particular type.
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tif ( exists( $$primaryReferenceItemTypes{ $referenceableObjectType } ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t# Items of this type of item must remain in the document even if they\'re not referenced
-\t\t\t# by other items. For instance, CHARACTERISTIC items can be referenced by other items,
-\t\t\t# but even if no items reference a particular CHARACTERISTIC item, the CHARACTERISTIC
-\t\t\t# item cannot be removed.
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tforeach my $itemKey ( keys( %$itemsOfThisReferenceableType ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy $potentialMatchEntry = $allPotentialReferenceMatches{ $itemKey };
-
-\t\t\tif ( ! defined( $potentialMatchEntry ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t# No items of this name / key are referenced by any reference.
-\t\t\t\tmy $metaDataOfUnreferencedItem = $$itemsOfThisReferenceableType{ $itemKey };
-\t\t\t\tassert( defined( $metaDataOfUnreferencedItem ) );
-
-\t\t\t\tpush( @metaDataOfItemsNotReferencedByAny, $metaDataOfUnreferencedItem );
-\t\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\tif ( ! exists( $$potentialMatchEntry{ $referenceableObjectType } ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t# While an item with this name / key is referenced by at least one reference, the
-\t\t\t\t# type of this particular item doesn\'t match any of those references.
-\t\t\t\tmy $metaDataOfUnreferencedItem = $$itemsOfThisReferenceableType{ $itemKey };
-\t\t\t\tassert( defined( $metaDataOfUnreferencedItem ) );
-
-\t\t\t\tpush( @metaDataOfItemsNotReferencedByAny, $metaDataOfUnreferencedItem );
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\treturn @metaDataOfItemsNotReferencedByAny;
-}
-
-# Keeps removing the bottom-most empty / incomplete items in the tree until no more empty /
-# incomplete nodes are found. Returns the following:
-#
-# 0) Reference to a dictionary of all empty items removed (by type).
-#
-# 1) Reference to a dictionary of all incomplete items removed (by type).
-#
-# 2) Total number of empty items removed.
-#
-# 3) Total number of incomplete items removed.
-sub __removeEmptyAndIncompleteItems($$$$$$$)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule,
-\t\t$printWarnings,
-\t\t$anyItemsDroppedDueToDeadNonNullableRefs,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tmy @nodesRemovedInAllIterations = ();
-
-\tmy $totalEmptyNodesRemoved = 0;
-\tmy $totalIncompleteNodesRemoved = 0;
-
-\tfor ( my $iterationIndex = 0;; ++$iterationIndex )
-\t{
-\t\tmy (
-\t\t\t$emptyNodesRemovedInThisIteration,
-\t\t\t$incompleteNodesRemovedInThisIteration
-\t\t) = __removeBottommostEmptyAndIncompleteItems(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$printWarnings,
-\t\t\t$anyItemsDroppedDueToDeadNonNullableRefs,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-
-\t\tif ( @$emptyNodesRemovedInThisIteration )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tpush(
-\t\t\t\t@nodesRemovedInAllIterations,
-\t\t\t\tmap { [ $_, TRUE ] } @$emptyNodesRemovedInThisIteration
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t$totalEmptyNodesRemoved += @$emptyNodesRemovedInThisIteration;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tif ( @$incompleteNodesRemovedInThisIteration )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tpush(
-\t\t\t\t@nodesRemovedInAllIterations,
-\t\t\t\tmap { [ $_, FALSE ] } @$incompleteNodesRemovedInThisIteration
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t$totalIncompleteNodesRemoved += @$incompleteNodesRemovedInThisIteration;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tif ( ! @$emptyNodesRemovedInThisIteration && ! @$incompleteNodesRemovedInThisIteration )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tlast;
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\tmy %removedEmptyItemsTypeCount = ();
-\tmy %removedIncompleteItemsTypeCount = ();
-
-\tmy @refsToRemovedItems = map { $$_[ 0 ] } @nodesRemovedInAllIterations;
-
-\tforeach my $infoAboutRemovedItem ( @nodesRemovedInAllIterations )
-\t{
-\t\tassert( defined( $infoAboutRemovedItem ) );
-\t\tassert( @$infoAboutRemovedItem == 2 );
-
-\t\tmy ( $removedItem, $wasRemovedBecauseItWasEmpty ) = @$infoAboutRemovedItem;
-
-\t\tmy $itemType = $$removedItem{ \'type\' };
-\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $itemType ) );
-
-\t\tif ( $printWarnings )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy $itemKey = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::determineItemKey( $removedItem, $dbgLogger );
-
-\t\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t\t"WARNING: %s %s is %s and will be removed (project %s, module %s).\
",
-\t\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t\t$itemKey,
-\t\t\t\t$wasRemovedBecauseItWasEmpty ? \'empty\' : \'incomplete\',
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tif ( $wasRemovedBecauseItWasEmpty )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tif ( exists( $removedEmptyItemsTypeCount{ $itemType } ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t++$removedEmptyItemsTypeCount{ $itemType };
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t\telse
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t$removedEmptyItemsTypeCount{ $itemType } = 1;
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t}
-\t\telse
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tif ( exists( $removedIncompleteItemsTypeCount{ $itemType } ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t++$removedIncompleteItemsTypeCount{ $itemType };
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t\telse
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t$removedIncompleteItemsTypeCount{ $itemType } = 1;
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\t# When removing empty items, we also need to update our references. After all, the items
-\t# we just removed may have held references to other items.
-\t__unregisterRemovedItemsFromReferenceDict(
-\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule,
-\t\t\\@refsToRemovedItems,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\treturn (
-\t\t\\%removedEmptyItemsTypeCount,
-\t\t\\%removedIncompleteItemsTypeCount,
-\t\t$totalEmptyNodesRemoved,
-\t\t$totalIncompleteNodesRemoved
-\t);
-}
-
-sub __renameItemsInReferenceDict($$$)
-{
-\tmy ( $itemRefsInThisModule, $renamedItems, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\tforeach my $itemTypeName ( sort( keys( %$renamedItems ) ) )
-\t{
-\t\tassert( $itemTypeName ne \'\' );
-\t\tmy $renamedItemsOfThisType = $$renamedItems{ $itemTypeName };
-\t\tassert( defined( $renamedItemsOfThisType ) );
-
-\t\tmy $refsHeldByItemsOfThisType = $$itemRefsInThisModule{ $renamedItemsOfThisType };
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $refsHeldByItemsOfThisType ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t# Reference dictionary has no references held by items of this type.
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tforeach my $oldName ( keys( %$renamedItemsOfThisType ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tassert( $oldName ne \'\' );
-
-\t\t\tmy $newName = $$renamedItemsOfThisType{ $oldName };
-\t\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $newName ) );
-\t\t\tassert( $oldName ne $newName );
-
-\t\t\tmy $refData = $$refsHeldByItemsOfThisType{ $oldName };
-\t\t\tassert( defined( $refData ) );
-
-\t\t\tdelete $$refsHeldByItemsOfThisType{ $oldName };
-\t\t\tassert( ! exists( $$refsHeldByItemsOfThisType{ $newName } ) );
-\t\t\t$$refsHeldByItemsOfThisType{ $newName } = $refData;
-\t\t}
-\t}
-}
-
-sub __unregisterRemovedItemsFromReferenceDict($$$)
-{
-\tmy ( $itemRefsInThisModule, $removedItems, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\tforeach my $removedItem ( @$removedItems )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $itemType = $$removedItem{ \'type\' };
-
-\t\tmy $refsHeldByItemsOfThisType = $$itemRefsInThisModule{ $itemType };
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $refsHeldByItemsOfThisType ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t# Reference dictionary has no references held by items of this type.
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tmy $itemKey = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::determineItemKey( $removedItem, $dbgLogger );
-\t\tdelete $$refsHeldByItemsOfThisType{ $itemKey };
-
-\t\tif ( ! keys( %$refsHeldByItemsOfThisType ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t# Reference dictionary no longer has items of this type, so get rid of the entire
-\t\t\t# type entry.
-\t\t\tdelete $$itemRefsInThisModule{ $itemType };
-\t\t}
-\t}
-}
-
-sub __removeUnreferencedItems($$$$$$$$)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatAreReferenceable,
-\t\t$primaryReferenceItemTypes,
-\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule,
-\t\t$printWarnings,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tmy @metaDataOfUnreferencedItems = __getMetaDataOfUnreferencedItems(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatAreReferenceable,
-\t\t$primaryReferenceItemTypes,
-\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tif ( @metaDataOfUnreferencedItems )
-\t{
-\t\t__removeTheseElementsFromThisModule(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\\@metaDataOfUnreferencedItems,
-\t\t\tTRUE,
-\t\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\tmy @removedUnreferencedItems = map { $$_{ \'element\' } } @metaDataOfUnreferencedItems;
-
-\tmy %removedItemsTypeCount = ();
-
-\tforeach my $removedItem ( @removedUnreferencedItems )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $itemType = $$removedItem{ \'type\' };
-\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $itemType ) );
-
-\t\tif ( $printWarnings )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy $itemKey = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::determineItemKey( $removedItem, $dbgLogger );
-
-\t\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t\t"WARNING: %s %s is unreferenced and will be removed (project %s, module %s).\
",
-\t\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t\t$itemKey,
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tif ( exists( $removedItemsTypeCount{ $itemType } ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t++$removedItemsTypeCount{ $itemType };
-\t\t}
-\t\telse
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t$removedItemsTypeCount{ $itemType } = 1;
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\treturn ( \\%removedItemsTypeCount, scalar( @removedUnreferencedItems ) );
-}
-
-# Performs a single cleanup iteration (removes dead references, unreferenced items and empty items).
-# Returns the following things:
-#
-# 0) true if another cleanup iteration (i.e. another call to this function) is necessary.
-#
-# 1) the number of dead item references removed in this iteration.
-sub __runModuleCleanupIteration($$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule,
-\t\t$metaDataTypeDictForModule,
-\t\t$primaryReferenceItemTypes,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatAreReferenceable,
-\t\t$nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t$predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\t$iterationCount,
-\t\t$printWarnings,
-\t\t$totalItemsRemoved,
-\t\t$allowRemovalOfNonNullableReferences,
-\t\t$instanceOptions,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tmy $timeAtStartOfThisIteration = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\tmy (
-\t\t$numberOfDeadRefsRemovedInThisIteration,
-\t\t$totalNumberOfReferencesOverall,
-\t\t$numberOfItemsDroppedDueToDeadNonNullableRefs
-\t) = __removeDeadReferences(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t\t$nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t$predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\t$metaDataTypeDictForModule,
-\t\t$allowRemovalOfNonNullableReferences,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tassert( $numberOfDeadRefsRemovedInThisIteration >= 0 );
-\tassert( $iterationCount >= 1 );
-
-\tmy $timeAfterRemovingDeadReferences = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\tif ( ! $$instanceOptions{ \'noTiming\' } )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $duration = $timeAfterRemovingDeadReferences - $timeAtStartOfThisIteration;
-\t\tif ( $duration < 0.0 ) { $duration = 0.0; }
-
-\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t"NOTE: %s (module cleanup; iteration #%u) Took %u.%03u seconds to remove %u " .
-\t\t\t\t"dead item references (out of %u references overall) from project %s " .
-\t\t\t\t"/ module %s.\
",
