-\t\t\tContext::getPackageContextWithTimeStampString(),
-\t\t\t$iterationCount,
-\t\t\t$duration,
-\t\t\t( $duration - int( $duration ) ) * 1000,
-\t\t\t$numberOfDeadRefsRemovedInThisIteration,
-\t\t\t$totalNumberOfReferencesOverall,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\tmy (
-\t\t$emptyItemsRemovedInThisIterationByType,
-\t\t$incompleteItemsRemovedInThisIterationByType,
-\t\t$numberOfEmptyItemsRemovedInThisIteration,
-\t\t$numberOfIncompleteItemsRemovedInThisIteration
-\t) = __removeEmptyAndIncompleteItems(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule,
-\t\t$printWarnings && $iterationCount == 1,
-\t\t$numberOfItemsDroppedDueToDeadNonNullableRefs > 0,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy $timeAfterRemovingEmptyItems = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\tif ( ! $$instanceOptions{ \'noTiming\' } )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $duration = $timeAfterRemovingEmptyItems - $timeAfterRemovingDeadReferences;
-\t\tif ( $duration < 0.0 ) { $duration = 0.0; }
-
-\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t\'NOTE: %s (module cleanup; iteration #%u) Took %u.%03u seconds to remove %u \' .
-\t\t\t\t\'empty and %u incomplete items from project %s / module %s.\',
-\t\t\tContext::getPackageContextWithTimeStampString(),
-\t\t\t$iterationCount,
-\t\t\t$duration,
-\t\t\t( $duration - int( $duration ) ) * 1000,
-\t\t\t$numberOfEmptyItemsRemovedInThisIteration,
-\t\t\t$numberOfIncompleteItemsRemovedInThisIteration,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t);
-
-\t\tif ( $numberOfEmptyItemsRemovedInThisIteration )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t\t\' Empty: (%s).\',
-\t\t\t\tjoin(
-\t\t\t\t\t\', \',
-\t\t\t\t\tmap {
-\t\t\t\t\t\tsprintf( \'%s: %u\', $_, $$emptyItemsRemovedInThisIterationByType{ $_ } )
-\t\t\t\t\t} sort( keys( %$emptyItemsRemovedInThisIterationByType ) )
-\t\t\t\t)
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tif ( $numberOfIncompleteItemsRemovedInThisIteration )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t\t\' Corrupt: (%s).\',
-\t\t\t\tjoin(
-\t\t\t\t\t\', \',
-\t\t\t\t\tmap {
-\t\t\t\t\t\tsprintf( \'%s: %u\', $_, $$incompleteItemsRemovedInThisIterationByType{ $_ } )
-\t\t\t\t\t} sort( keys( %$incompleteItemsRemovedInThisIterationByType ) )
-\t\t\t\t)
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tprint( "\
" );
-\t}
-
-\tmy (
-\t\t$unreferencedItemsRemovedInThisIterationByType,
-\t\t$numberOfUnreferencedItemsRemovedInThisIteration,
-\t) = __removeUnreferencedItems(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatAreReferenceable,
-\t\t$primaryReferenceItemTypes,
-\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule,
-\t\t$printWarnings && $iterationCount == 1,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy $timeAfterRemovingUnreferencedItems = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\tif ( ! $$instanceOptions{ \'noTiming\' } )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $duration = $timeAfterRemovingUnreferencedItems - $timeAfterRemovingEmptyItems;
-\t\tif ( $duration < 0.0 ) { $duration = 0.0; }
-
-\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t"NOTE: %s (module cleanup; iteration #%u) Took %u.%03u seconds to remove %u " .
-\t\t\t\t"unreferenced items from project %s / module %s%s.\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getPackageContextWithTimeStampString(),
-\t\t\t$iterationCount,
-\t\t\t$duration,
-\t\t\t( $duration - int( $duration ) ) * 1000,
-\t\t\t$numberOfUnreferencedItemsRemovedInThisIteration,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$numberOfUnreferencedItemsRemovedInThisIteration == 0 ?
-\t\t\t\t\'\' :
-\t\t\t\t(
-\t\t\t\t\t\' (\' .
-\t\t\t\t\tjoin(
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\', \',
-\t\t\t\t\t\tmap {
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\tsprintf( \'%s: %u\', $_, $$unreferencedItemsRemovedInThisIterationByType{ $_ } )
-\t\t\t\t\t\t} sort( keys( %$unreferencedItemsRemovedInThisIterationByType ) )
-\t\t\t\t\t) .
-\t\t\t\t\t\')\'
-\t\t\t\t)
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\tmy $totalRemovalsInThisIteration = $numberOfEmptyItemsRemovedInThisIteration +
-\t\t$numberOfUnreferencedItemsRemovedInThisIteration + $numberOfDeadRefsRemovedInThisIteration;
-
-\tif ( $totalRemovalsInThisIteration == 0 && $iterationCount > 1 )
-\t{
-\t\t# No more dead references and empty or unreferenced items found. No need to loop around for
-\t\t# another iteration.
-\t\treturn ( FALSE, $numberOfDeadRefsRemovedInThisIteration );
-\t}
-
-\tforeach my $itemType ( keys( %$emptyItemsRemovedInThisIterationByType ) )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $numberOfItemsOfThisTypeRemovedInThisIteration = $$emptyItemsRemovedInThisIterationByType{ $itemType };
-\t\tassert( defined( $numberOfItemsOfThisTypeRemovedInThisIteration ) );
-
-\t\tif ( exists( $$totalItemsRemoved{ $itemType } ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t$$totalItemsRemoved{ $itemType } += $numberOfItemsOfThisTypeRemovedInThisIteration;
-\t\t}
-\t\telse
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t$$totalItemsRemoved{ $itemType } = $numberOfItemsOfThisTypeRemovedInThisIteration;
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\tforeach my $itemType ( keys( %$unreferencedItemsRemovedInThisIterationByType ) )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $numberOfItemsOfThisTypeRemovedInThisIteration = $$unreferencedItemsRemovedInThisIterationByType{ $itemType };
-\t\tassert( defined( $numberOfItemsOfThisTypeRemovedInThisIteration ) );
-
-\t\tif ( exists( $$totalItemsRemoved{ $itemType } ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t$$totalItemsRemoved{ $itemType } += $numberOfItemsOfThisTypeRemovedInThisIteration;
-\t\t}
-\t\telse
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t$$totalItemsRemoved{ $itemType } = $numberOfItemsOfThisTypeRemovedInThisIteration;
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\treturn ( TRUE, $numberOfDeadRefsRemovedInThisIteration );
-}
-
-# Repeatedly purges dead references and removes empty and unreferenced items until no dead wood is
-# left in the module.
-sub __cleanUpModule($$$$$$$)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$printWarnings,
-\t\t$resetReferenceCache,
-\t\t$allowRemovalOfNonNullableReferences,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tmy $timeAtStart = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\tprintf(
-\t\t"NOTE: %s Starting cleanup in project %s / module %s.\
",
-\t\tContext::getPackageContextWithTimeStampString(),
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName
-\t);
-
-\tmy $instanceOptions = $$self{ \'options\' };
-\tassert( defined( $instanceOptions ) );
-
-\tmy $itemTypePluginManager = getItemTypePluginManager( $self, $dbgLogger );
-\tassert( defined( $itemTypePluginManager ) );
-
-\tmy (
-\t\t$itemTypesThatAreReferenceable,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems
-\t) = $itemTypePluginManager->getItemTypeReferenceRelationships( $dbgLogger );
-
-\tmy %primaryReferenceItemTypes = map { $_ => undef } PRIMARY_REFERENCE_ITEM_TYPES;
-
-\tmy %nullReferenceKeywordsTable = NULL_REFERENCE_KEYWORDS;
-
-\tmy %predefinedDataTypeLookupTable = A2L_Lib2::PredefinedDataTypes::makePredefinedDataTypeLookupTable(
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\tA2L_Lib2::Util::getLenientOptionsDict( $dbgLogger, %$instanceOptions )
-\t);
-
-\tmy $metaDataTypeDictForModule = __getMetaDataCacheForType(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\tundef,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy %variablePositionFieldsLookupTable = A2L_Lib2::VariablePositionFields::VARIABLE_POSITION_FIELDS_LOOKUP_TABLE;
-
-\tmy $itemRefsInThisModule = __getItemReferencesInThisModule(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$metaDataTypeDictForModule,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t\t\\%variablePositionFieldsLookupTable,
-\t\t\\%nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t\\%predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\t$resetReferenceCache,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy %totalItemsRemoved = ();
-
-\tmy $numberOfDeadRefsRemovedInFirstIteration = 0;
-
-\t# Keep removing empty and unreferenced items as well as dead references until there no longer
-\t# are any left. The reason this has to be done in a loop is that purging dead references may
-\t# turn previously non-empty items empty, which means they, in turn, have to be removed as well.
-\tmy $iterationCount = 1;
-
-\tfor ( ; ; ++$iterationCount ) # <- break criterion in loop body
-\t{
-\t\tmy (
-\t\t\t$needAnotherIteration,
-\t\t\t$numberOfDeadRefsRemovedInThisIteration
-\t\t) = __runModuleCleanupIteration(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule,
-\t\t\t$metaDataTypeDictForModule,
-\t\t\t\\%primaryReferenceItemTypes,
-\t\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t\t\t$itemTypesThatAreReferenceable,
-\t\t\t\\%nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t\t\\%predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\t\t$iterationCount,
-\t\t\t$printWarnings,
-\t\t\t\\%totalItemsRemoved,
-\t\t\t$allowRemovalOfNonNullableReferences,
-\t\t\t$instanceOptions,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-
-\t\tif ( $iterationCount == 1 )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t$numberOfDeadRefsRemovedInFirstIteration = $numberOfDeadRefsRemovedInThisIteration;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tif ( ! $needAnotherIteration )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tlast;
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\tassert( $iterationCount > 0 );
-\tmy $timeAtEnd = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\tif ( ! $$instanceOptions{ \'noTiming\' } )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $duration = $timeAtEnd - $timeAtStart;
-\t\tif ( $duration < 0.0 ) { $duration = 0.0; }
-
-\t\tmy $totalNumberOfItemsRemoved = List::Util::sum( 0, values( %totalItemsRemoved ) );
-
-\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t"NOTE: %s Finished cleanup in project %s / module %s. Took %u.%03u seconds and %u " .
-\t\t\t\t"iterations to delete %u dead item references. Additionally, %u empty / " .
-\t\t\t\t"unreferenced items were deleted (%s).\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getPackageContextWithTimeStampString(),
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$duration,
-\t\t\t( $duration - int( $duration ) ) * 1000,
-\t\t\t$iterationCount,
-\t\t\t$numberOfDeadRefsRemovedInFirstIteration,
-\t\t\t$totalNumberOfItemsRemoved,
-\t\t\tjoin(
-\t\t\t\t\', \',
-\t\t\t\tmap {
-\t\t\t\t\tsprintf( \'%s: %u\', $_, $totalItemsRemoved{ $_ } )
-\t\t\t\t} sort( keys( %totalItemsRemoved ) )
-\t\t\t)
-\t\t);
-\t}
-}
-
-sub __determineIfElementIsIncomplete($$$$$$$$)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$itemTypePluginManager,
-\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t$itemKey,
-\t\t$item,
-\t\t$isCompleteFuncForThisType,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tif ( ! $$item{ \'parsed\' } )
-\t{
-\t\t# Never mess with items that haven\'t been parsed.
-\t\t$dbgLogger->printf(
-\t\t\t\'%s %s (project %s, module %s) is an unparsed item and is therefore considered complete.\',
-\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t$itemKey,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t);
-
-\t\treturn FALSE;
-\t}
-
-\tmy @violationInfoTuple = A2L_Lib2::ItemTypePluginManager::itemHasRequiredChildItems(
-\t\t$itemTypePluginManager,
-\t\t$item,
-\t\tundef,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tif ( @violationInfoTuple )
-\t{
-\t\t$dbgLogger->printf( sub {
-
-\t\t\tassert( @violationInfoTuple == 3 );
-\t\t\tassert( StringFuncs::noneNull( @violationInfoTuple ) );
-\t\t\tmy ( $typeOfChildItem, $numberOfThisTypeWeGot, $minOccurrences ) = @violationInfoTuple;
-
-\t\t\treturn sprintf(
-\t\t\t\t\'%s %s (project %s, module %s) is incomplete (is missing %u children of type %s).\',
-\t\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t\t$itemKey,
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\t$minOccurrences - $numberOfThisTypeWeGot,
-\t\t\t\t$typeOfChildItem
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t} );
-\t\treturn TRUE;
-\t}
-
-\tmy $elementData = $$item{ \'data\' };
-\tassert( defined( $elementData ) );
-
-\tmy $elementChildren = $$item{ \'children\' };
-\tassert( defined( $elementChildren ) );
-
-\treturn ! $isCompleteFuncForThisType->(
-\t\t$item,
-\t\t$elementData,
-\t\t$elementChildren,
-\t\t$itemKey,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-}
-
-sub __determineIfElementIsEmpty($$$$$$$)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t$itemKey,
-\t\t$item,
-\t\t$isEmptyFuncForThisType,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tif ( ! $$item{ \'parsed\' } )
-\t{
-\t\t# Never mess with items that haven\'t been parsed.
-\t\t$dbgLogger->print( sub {
-\t\t\treturn sprintf(
-\t\t\t\t\'%s %s (project %s, module %s) is an unparsed item and is therefore considered non-empty.\',
-\t\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t\t$itemKey,
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t} );
-
-\t\treturn FALSE;
-\t}
-
-\tmy $elementData = $$item{ \'data\' };
-\tassert( defined( $elementData ) );
-
-\tmy $elementChildren = $$item{ \'children\' };
-\tassert( defined( $elementChildren ) );
-
-\treturn $isEmptyFuncForThisType->( $elementData, $elementChildren, $itemKey, $dbgLogger );
-}
-
-# Returns a dictionary containing all references held by any items in the specified modules.
-#
-# The returned dictionary maps all references to the projects / modules in which they exist. Within
-# each module, references are further grouped by the types of the items that hold the references.
-sub __getItemReferences($$$$$$$%)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t\t$nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t$predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\t$attemptToResolve,
-\t\t$onFailureToResolve, # <- only relevant if $attemptToResolve is true
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%projectModuleCombinationFilters
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tmy %itemRefs = ();
-
-\tmy %variablePositionFieldsLookupTable = A2L_Lib2::VariablePositionFields::VARIABLE_POSITION_FIELDS_LOOKUP_TABLE;
-
-\t__walkTypeCacheForTheseProjectModuleCombos(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\tsub {
-\t\t\tmy ( $projectName, $moduleName, $metaDataTypeDictForThisModule, $dbgLogger_ ) = @_;
-
-\t\t\tmy $itemRefsInThisModule = __determineItemReferencesInThisModule(
-\t\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\t$metaDataTypeDictForThisModule,
-\t\t\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t\t\t\t\\%variablePositionFieldsLookupTable,
-\t\t\t\t$nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t\t\t$predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\t\t\t$attemptToResolve,
-\t\t\t\t$onFailureToResolve, # <- only relevant if $attemptToResolve is true
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\tif ( ! keys( %$itemRefsInThisModule ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\treturn TRUE;
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\tmy $entryForCurrentProject = $itemRefs{ $projectName };
-
-\t\t\tif ( ! defined( $entryForCurrentProject ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t$entryForCurrentProject = $itemRefs{ $projectName } = {};
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t$$entryForCurrentProject{ $moduleName } = $itemRefsInThisModule;
-
-\t\t\treturn TRUE;
-\t\t},
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%projectModuleCombinationFilters
-\t);
-
-\treturn %itemRefs;
-}
-
-# Returns a reference to a dictionary containing all item references held by any items in the
-# specified project / module. The references may or may not be valid.
-sub __getItemReferencesInThisModule($$$$$$$$$$)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$metaDataTypeDict,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t\t$variablePositionFieldsLookupTable,
-\t\t$nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t$predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\t$forceRefresh,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tif ( ! ENABLE_REFERENCE_INFO_CACHING )
-\t{
-\t\t$forceRefresh = TRUE;
-\t}
-
-\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $projectName ) );
-\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $moduleName ) );
-
-\tmy $timeAtStart = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\tmy $refsDict = $$self{ \'refs\' };
-\tassert( defined( $refsDict ) );
-
-\tmy $refsInProject = $$refsDict{ $projectName };
-
-\tmy $refsInModule;
-
-\tif ( defined( $refsInProject ) )
-\t{
-\t\t$refsInModule = $$refsInProject{ $moduleName };
-\t}
-\telse
-\t{
-\t\t$refsInProject = $$refsDict{ $projectName } = {};
-\t}
-
-\tmy $gotInfoFromCache = FALSE;
-
-\tif ( ! $forceRefresh && defined( $refsInModule ) )
-\t{
-\t\t$gotInfoFromCache = TRUE;
-\t}
-\telse
-\t{
-\t\t$refsInModule = $$refsInProject{ $moduleName } = __determineItemReferencesInThisModule(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$metaDataTypeDict,
-\t\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t\t\t$variablePositionFieldsLookupTable,
-\t\t\t$nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t\t$predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\t\tTRUE,
-\t\t\tA2L_Lib2::Subfields::ON_DEAD_REFERENCE_KEEP,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\tmy $instanceOptions = $$self{ \'options\' };
-\tassert( defined( $instanceOptions ) );
-
-\tif ( ! $$instanceOptions{ \'noTiming\' } )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $duration = Time::HiRes::time() - $timeAtStart;
-\t\tif ( $duration < 0.0 ) { $duration = 0.0; }
-
-\t\tmy $totalNumberOfReferences = 0;
-
-\t\tforeach my $itemType ( sort( keys( %$refsInModule ) ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy $keyDict = $$refsInModule{ $itemType };
-
-\t\t\tforeach my $itemKey ( sort( keys( %$keyDict ) ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tmy $listOfReferencesHeldByThisItem = $$keyDict{ $itemKey };
-
-\t\t\t\tmy $referencesHeldByThisItem = List::Util::sum(
-\t\t\t\t\t0,
-\t\t\t\t\tmap {
-\t\t\t\t\t\tA2L_Lib2::ReferenceSubfield::getNumberOfItemReferenceInstances( $_ )
-\t\t\t\t\t} @$listOfReferencesHeldByThisItem
-\t\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t\t$totalNumberOfReferences += $referencesHeldByThisItem;
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t"NOTE: %s Took %u.%03u seconds to %s info about %u item references in project %s / module %s.\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getPackageContextWithTimeStampString(),
-\t\t\t$duration,
-\t\t\t( $duration - int( $duration ) ) * 1000,
-\t\t\t$gotInfoFromCache ? \'retrieve cached\' : \'obtain\',
-\t\t\t$totalNumberOfReferences,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\treturn $refsInModule;
-}
-
-# Returns a reference to a dictionary containing all item references held by any items in the
-# specified project / module. The references may or may not be valid.
-sub __determineItemReferencesInThisModule
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$metaDataTypeDict,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t\t$variablePositionFieldsLookupTable,
-\t\t$nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t$predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\t$attemptToResolve,
-\t\t$onFailureToResolve, # <- only relevant if $attemptToResolve is true
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $projectName ) );
-\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $moduleName ) );
-
-\tmy $timeAtStart = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\tmy %itemRefsInThisModule = ();
-
-\tforeach my $itemTypeThatMayReferenceOtherItems ( @$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $categoryDict = $$metaDataTypeDict{ $itemTypeThatMayReferenceOtherItems };
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $categoryDict ) || ! keys( %$categoryDict ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t# No items of this type in this cache -> A2L document doesn\'t contain any items of
-\t\t\t# this type.
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tmy %itemRefsOfThisItemType = __getItemRefsHeldByThisType(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$itemTypeThatMayReferenceOtherItems,
-\t\t\t$categoryDict,
-\t\t\t$attemptToResolve ? $metaDataTypeDict : undef,
-\t\t\t$onFailureToResolve, # <- only relevant if $attemptToResolve is true
-\t\t\t$variablePositionFieldsLookupTable,
-\t\t\t$nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t\t$predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-
-\t\tif ( ! keys( %itemRefsOfThisItemType ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\t$itemRefsInThisModule{ $itemTypeThatMayReferenceOtherItems } = \\%itemRefsOfThisItemType;
-\t}
-
-\tmy $refsDict = $$self{ \'refs\' };
-\tassert( defined( $refsDict ) );
-
-\tmy $refsInProject = $$refsDict{ $projectName };
-
-\tif ( ! defined( $refsInProject ) )
-\t{
-\t\t$refsInProject = $$refsDict{ $projectName } = {};
-\t}
-
-\t$$refsInProject{ $moduleName } = \\%itemRefsInThisModule;
-
-\tmy $instanceOptions = $$self{ \'options\' };
-\tassert( defined( $instanceOptions ) );
-
-\tif ( ! $$instanceOptions{ \'noTiming\' } )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $duration = Time::HiRes::time() - $timeAtStart;
-\t\tif ( $duration < 0.0 ) { $duration = 0.0; }
-
-\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t"NOTE: %s Took %u.%03u seconds to collect item reference info for project %s /" .
-\t\t\t\t" module %s.\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getPackageContextWithTimeStampString(),
-\t\t\t$duration,
-\t\t\t( $duration - int( $duration ) ) * 1000,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\treturn \\%itemRefsInThisModule;
-}
-
-# Returns a dictionary containing all references held by any items of type $thisTypeName (in project
-# $projectName / module $moduleName). The references may or may not be valid.
-sub __getItemRefsHeldByThisType
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$thisTypeName,
-\t\t$categoryDict,
-\t\t$metaDataTypeDictOrUndef, # <- if defined, also try to resolve references
-\t\t$onFailureToResolve, # <- only relevant if $metaDataTypeDictOrUndef is defined
-\t\t$variablePositionFieldsLookupTable,
-\t\t$nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t$predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tmy %itemRefsOfThisItemType = ();
-
-\tmy $itemTypePluginManager = getItemTypePluginManager( $self, $dbgLogger );
-
-\t# Get plugin data for this type. We need to know which (if any) of the fixed-position and
-\t# variable-position fields an item of this type may have are references.
-\tmy $pluginDataForThisType = A2L_Lib2::ItemTypePluginManager::getPluginData(
-\t\t$itemTypePluginManager,
-\t\t$thisTypeName,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy $expectedFixedPositionFields = $$pluginDataForThisType{ \'expectedFixedPositionFields\' };
-\tmy $allowedVariablePositionFields = $$pluginDataForThisType{ \'allowedVariablePositionFields\' };
-
-\tmy %variablePositionFieldsThatMayReferenceItems = A2L_Lib2::VariablePositionFields::getVariablePositionFieldsThatMayHoldReferences(
-\t\t$variablePositionFieldsLookupTable,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tforeach my $itemKey ( sort( keys( %$categoryDict ) ) )
-\t{
-\t\t$dbgLogger->printf(
-\t\t\t\'Checking if %s %s (project %s / module %s) references any objects.\',
-\t\t\t$thisTypeName,
-\t\t\t$itemKey,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t);
-
-\t\tmy $metaDataEntry = $$categoryDict{ $itemKey };
-\t\tassert( defined( $metaDataEntry ) );
-
-\t\tmy $item = $$metaDataEntry{ \'element\' };
-\t\tassert( defined( $item ) );
-
-\t\tmy @referencesHeldByThisItem = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::getItemRefs(
-\t\t\t$item,
-\t\t\t$expectedFixedPositionFields,
-\t\t\t$variablePositionFieldsLookupTable,
-\t\t\t$allowedVariablePositionFields,
-\t\t\t$nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t\t$predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\t\t\\%variablePositionFieldsThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t\t\t$metaDataTypeDictOrUndef, # <- if defined, also try to resolve references
-\t\t\t$onFailureToResolve, # <- only relevant if $metaDataTypeDictOrUndef is defined
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-
-\t\tif ( @referencesHeldByThisItem )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t$itemRefsOfThisItemType{ $itemKey } = \\@referencesHeldByThisItem;
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\treturn %itemRefsOfThisItemType;
-}
-
-# Sets the calibration access level of every AXIS_PTS, CHARACTERISTIC and BLOB (including INSTANCE
-# / TYPEDEF_* combos), to at most (but no higher than) the specified calibration access level.
-#
-# Returns true if at least one AXIS_PTS, CHARACTERISTIC or BLOB was changed.
-sub setMaxCalibrationAccessLevelInModule
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$maxCalibrationAccessLevel,
-\t\t$paramInfoDict,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tmy $anyChangesMade = FALSE;
-
-\tforeach my $itemType ( \'AXIS_PTS\', \'CHARACTERISTIC\', \'BLOB\' )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $metaDataCacheForThisType = __getMetaDataCacheForType(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $metaDataCacheForThisType ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t# Got no items of this type.
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tmy @itemNames = sort( keys( %$metaDataCacheForThisType ) );
-
-\t\tif ( ! @itemNames )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t# Got no items of this type.
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tmy $paramInfoDictForThisType = $$paramInfoDict{ $itemType };
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $paramInfoDictForThisType ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] Parameter info dictionary does not contain entries of type %s!\
",
-\t\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t\t$itemType
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tforeach my $itemName ( @itemNames )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy $infoAboutThisItem = $$paramInfoDictForThisType{ $itemName };
-
-\t\t\tmy $effectiveCalibrationAccess;
-
-\t\t\tif ( defined( $infoAboutThisItem ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t$effectiveCalibrationAccess = $$infoAboutThisItem{ \'CALIBRATION_ACCESS\' };
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t\telse
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t# There is no entry in the param info dictionary for this item. This is (somewhat)
-\t\t\t\t# acceptable only if this is an unused AXIS_PTS.
-\t\t\t\tif ( $itemType ne \'AXIS_PTS\' )
-\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] Specified parameter information dictionary has no entry for " .
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t"%s %s (which does exist in the A2L document, though)!\
",
-\t\t\t\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$itemName
-\t\t\t\t\t);
-\t\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t\t\t"WARNING: [%s] Specified parameter information dictionary has no entry for " .
-\t\t\t\t\t\t"%s %s (assuming this is an unused %s)!\
",
-\t\t\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t\t\t$itemName,
-\t\t\t\t\t$itemType
-\t\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t\t# Assume most restrictive setting to enforce that we will add an explicit
-\t\t\t\t# CALIBRATION_ACCESS entry for this item.
-\t\t\t\t$effectiveCalibrationAccess = \'NO_CALIBRATION\';
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $effectiveCalibrationAccess ) );
-
-\t\t\tmy $levelToUse = A2L_Lib2::ParamInfo::UtilityFuncs::pickLeastRestrictiveCalibrationAccessLevel(
-\t\t\t\t$effectiveCalibrationAccess,
-\t\t\t\t$maxCalibrationAccessLevel,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\tmy $metaDataForItem = $$metaDataCacheForThisType{ $itemName };
-\t\t\tassert( defined( $metaDataForItem ) );
-
-\t\t\tmy $item = $$metaDataForItem{ \'element\' };
-\t\t\tassert( defined( $item ) );
-
-\t\t\tmy $variablePositionFields = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::getVariablePositionFields(
-\t\t\t\t$item,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\tA2L_Lib2::VariablePositionFields::deleteInstances(
-\t\t\t\t$variablePositionFields,
-\t\t\t\t\'READ_ONLY\',
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\tA2L_Lib2::VariablePositionFields::setSingleInstance(
-\t\t\t\t$variablePositionFields,
-\t\t\t\t\'CALIBRATION_ACCESS\',
-\t\t\t\t{ \'Type\' => $levelToUse },
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t$anyChangesMade = TRUE;
-
-\t\t\t# For CHARACTERISTIC items, also make sure no child AXIS_DESCR item has the READ_ONLY
-\t\t\t# attribute set.
-\t\t\tif ( $itemType ne \'CHARACTERISTIC\' )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tmy @childrenOfType_AXIS_DESCR = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::getChildrenOfThisType(
-\t\t\t\t\t$item,
-\t\t\t\t\t\'AXIS_DESCR\',
-\t\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t\tforeach my $childOfType_AXIS_DESCR ( @childrenOfType_AXIS_DESCR )
-\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\tmy $variablePositionFieldsOf_AXIS_DESCR = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::getVariablePositionFields(
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$childOfType_AXIS_DESCR,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t\t\tmy $anythingDeleted = A2L_Lib2::VariablePositionFields::deleteInstances(
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$variablePositionFieldsOf_AXIS_DESCR,
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\'READ_ONLY\',
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t\t\tif ( $anythingDeleted )
-\t\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$anyChangesMade = TRUE;
-\t\t\t\t\t}
-\t\t\t\t}
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\treturn $anyChangesMade;
-}
-
-# Applies the specified MAX_REFRESH settings to all CHARACTERISTIC, AXIS_PTS, MEASUREMENT and BLOB
-# items listed in %scalingUnitAndRatePerItem.
-#
-# Example content of the %scalingUnitAndRatePerItem dictionary:
-# my %scalingUnitAndRatePerItem = (
-#     \'CHARACTERISTIC\' => {
-#         \'MyFirst_CHARACTERISTIC\' => {
-#             \'ScalingUnit\' => 7
-#             \'Rate\'        => 1
-#         },
-#
-#         \'MySecond_CHARACTERISTIC\' => {
-#             \'ScalingUnit\' => 7
-#             \'Rate\'        => 2
-#         }
-#     },
-#     \'AXIS_PTS\' => {
-#         \'SomeHighlyImportant_AXIS_PTS\' => {
-#             \'ScalingUnit\' => 7
-#             \'Rate\'        => 2
-#         }
-#     }
-# );
-#
-# Returns the total number of MAX_REFRESH tags set in the module.
-sub set_MAX_REFRESH_tag
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $projectName, $moduleName, $dbgLogger, %scalingUnitAndRatePerItem ) = @_;
-
-\tmy $itemTypePluginManager = getItemTypePluginManager( $self, $dbgLogger );
-\tassert( defined( $itemTypePluginManager ) );
-
-\t# Make a look-up dictionary for all types that may have a MAX_REFRESH variable-position field.
-\tmy %eligibleItemTypes = map { $_ => undef } $itemTypePluginManager->getItemTypesWithTheseVariablePositionFields(
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t\'MAX_REFRESH\'
-\t);
-
-\tmy $numberOfMAX_REFRESH_tagsSet = 0;
-
-\tforeach my $itemType ( sort( keys( %scalingUnitAndRatePerItem ) ) )
-\t{
-\t\tif ( $itemType eq \'\' )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] Empty item type string in %%scalingUnitAndRatePerItem argument!\
",
-\t\t\t\tContext::getContext()
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tif ( ! exists( $eligibleItemTypes{ $itemType } ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] %%scalingUnitAndRatePerItem argument contains item type %s which is " .
-\t\t\t\t\t"not eligible for a MAX_REFRESH tag!\
",
-\t\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t\t$itemType
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tmy $itemsAndSettingsForThisType = $scalingUnitAndRatePerItem{ $itemType };
-
-\t\tmy @namesOfItemsOfThisTypeToTouch = defined( $itemsAndSettingsForThisType ) ?
-\t\t\tsort( keys( %$itemsAndSettingsForThisType ) ) :
-\t\t\t();
-
-\t\tif ( ! @namesOfItemsOfThisTypeToTouch )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t# This is not really supposed to be undefined / empty, but we\'ll just take this to mean
-\t\t\t# that there are no items of this type whose MAX_REFRESH tags we\'re supposed to change.
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tmy $metaDataCacheForThisType = __getMetaDataCacheForType(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $metaDataCacheForThisType ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] Cannot set MAX_REFRESH tags for items of type %s because the document " .
-\t\t\t\t\t"does not have any items of this type!\
",
-\t\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t\t$itemType
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t}
-
-\t\tforeach my $itemName ( @namesOfItemsOfThisTypeToTouch )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy $metaDataForThisItem = $$metaDataCacheForThisType{ $itemName };
-
-\t\t\tif ( ! defined( $metaDataForThisItem ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] Cannot set MAX_REFRESH tags %s %s because the document does not " .
-\t\t\t\t\t\t"contain such an item!\
",
-\t\t\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t\t\t$itemName
-\t\t\t\t);
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\tmy $maxRefreshValues = $$itemsAndSettingsForThisType{ $itemName };
-
-\t\t\tif ( ! defined( $maxRefreshValues ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] %%scalingUnitAndRatePerItem argument does not contain " .
-\t\t\t\t\t\t"MAX_REFRESH value dictionary for %s %s!\
",
-\t\t\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t\t\t$itemName
-\t\t\t\t);
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\tmy $scalingUnit = $$maxRefreshValues{ \'ScalingUnit\' };
-\t\t\tmy $rate = $$maxRefreshValues{ \'Rate\' };
-
-\t\t\tif ( StringFuncs::null( $scalingUnit ) || StringFuncs::null( $rate ) )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] %%scalingUnitAndRatePerItem argument does not contain " .
-\t\t\t\t\t\t"a valid MAX_REFRESH value dictionary for %s %s (either \'ScalingUnit\' or " .
-\t\t\t\t\t\t"\'Rate\' is missing / undef / empty)!\
",
-\t\t\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t\t\t$itemName
-\t\t\t\t);
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\tmy $item = $$metaDataForThisItem{ \'element\' };
-\t\t\tassert( defined( $item ) );
-
-\t\t\tmy $variablePositionFields = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::getVariablePositionFields(
-\t\t\t\t$item,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\tA2L_Lib2::VariablePositionFields::setSingleInstance(
-\t\t\t\t$variablePositionFields,
-\t\t\t\t\'MAX_REFRESH\',
-\t\t\t\t{ \'ScalingUnit\' => $scalingUnit, \'Rate\' => $rate },
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t++$numberOfMAX_REFRESH_tagsSet;
-\t\t}
-\t}
-
-\treturn $numberOfMAX_REFRESH_tagsSet;
-}
-
-sub getItemTypePluginManager($$)
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\tmy $itemTypePluginManager = $$self{ \'itemTypePluginManager\' };
-
-\tif ( ! defined( $itemTypePluginManager ) )
-\t{
-\t\t$itemTypePluginManager = A2L_Lib2::ItemTypePluginManager->new( $dbgLogger );
-\t\t$$self{ \'itemTypePluginManager\' } = $itemTypePluginManager;
-\t}
-
-\treturn $itemTypePluginManager;
-}
-
-# Reassigns every calibratable object in %$mappings to the FUNCTION assigned to it in %$mappings.
-# Non-existent calibratable objects are ignored.
-#
-# Whether missing FUNCTION objects should cause an error or be created automatically is controlled
-# via the \'throwOnMissingFunctions\' option. If this is set to false (or not specified at all),
-# missing FUNCTION objects will automatically be created in the A2L document.
-#
-# The function does not return anything.
-sub remapCalibratableObjectsToFunctions($$$$$%)
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $projectName, $moduleName, $mappings, $dbgLogger, %options ) = @_;
-
-\tmy $timeAtStart = Time::HiRes::time();
-
-\t# Get a list of all calibratable items (MEASUREMENT, CHARACTERISTIC, AXIS_PTS) in this module.
-\tmy %calibratableItems = getItemsInNamespace(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\'calibratable\',
-\t\tTRUE,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy %referenceData = ();
-
-\tmy %functionItems = getItemsInNamespace(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\'functions\',
-\t\tTRUE,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy $numberRemapped = 0;
-
-\tforeach my $itemName ( sort( keys( %$mappings ) ) )
-\t{
-\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $itemName ) );
-\t\tmy $matchingElement = $calibratableItems{ $itemName };
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $matchingElement ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t\t"WARNING: %s Cannot re-assign calibratable object %s to different FUNCTION. No " .
-\t\t\t\t\t"such calibratable object in project %s / module %s!\
",
-\t\t\t\tContext::getPackageContextWithTimeStampString(),
-\t\t\t\t$itemName,
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t}
-
-\t\t__remapItemToFunction(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$matchingElement,
-\t\t\t$itemName,
-\t\t\t$mappings,
-\t\t\t\\%functionItems,
-\t\t\t\\%referenceData,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t\t%options
-\t\t);
-
-\t\t++$numberRemapped;
-\t}
-
-\tif ( $numberRemapped > 0 )
-\t{
-\t\t# Our reference data must be updated.
-\t\t__getItemReferencesInThisModule_wrapper(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\tTRUE, # <- force a refresh
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-
-\t\t__cleanUpModule( $self, $projectName, $moduleName, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, $dbgLogger );
-\t}
-
-\tmy $instanceOptions = $$self{ \'options\' };
-\tassert( defined( $instanceOptions ) );
-
-\tif ( ! $$instanceOptions{ \'noTiming\' } )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $duration = Time::HiRes::time() - $timeAtStart;
-\t\tif ( $duration < 0.0 ) { $duration = 0.0; }
-
-\t\tprintf(
-\t\t\t"NOTE: %s Took %u.%03u seconds to remap %u calibratable objects (out of %u in total) " .
-\t\t\t\t"to different FUNCTION items (project %s / module %s).\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getPackageContextWithTimeStampString(),
-\t\t\t$duration,
-\t\t\t( $duration - int( $duration ) ) * 1000,
-\t\t\t$numberRemapped,
-\t\t\tscalar( keys( %calibratableItems ) ),
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t);
-\t}
-}
-
-sub __remapItemToFunction($$$$$$$$$%)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$matchingElement,
-\t\t$itemName,
-\t\t$mappings,
-\t\t$functionItems,
-\t\t$referenceData,
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t%options
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tif ( ! keys( %$referenceData ) )
-\t{
-\t\t# Reference data not yet obtained. Do it now.
-\t\t%$referenceData = __getItemReferencesInThisModule_wrapper(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\tFALSE,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-\t\tassert( keys( %$referenceData ) );
-\t}
-
-\tmy $nameOfFunctionToWhichToRemap = $$mappings{ $itemName };
-\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $nameOfFunctionToWhichToRemap ) );
-
-\tmy $itemType = $$matchingElement{ \'type\' };
-
-\tmy $corresponding_FUNCTION_item = $$functionItems{ $nameOfFunctionToWhichToRemap };
-
-\tif ( ! defined( $corresponding_FUNCTION_item ) )
-\t{
-\t\t$dbgLogger->printf(
-\t\t\t\'FUNCTION %s does not exist (while trying to re-assign calibratable object %s in \' .
-\t\t\t\t\'project %s / module %s).\',
-\t\t\t$nameOfFunctionToWhichToRemap,
-\t\t\t$itemName,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t);
-
-\t\tif ( $options{ \'throwOnMissingFunctions\' } )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy @existingFunctionNames = sort( keys( %$functionItems ) );
-
-\t\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] Cannot re-assign %s %s to FUNCTION %s (in project %s / module %s)! " .
-\t\t\t\t\t"The module does not contain such a FUNCTION item, and the " .
-\t\t\t\t\t"\'throwOnMissingFunctions\' option was passed as true! The following %u " .
-\t\t\t\t\t"FUNCTION items exist in this module:\
\
\\t%s\
\
",
-\t\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t\t$itemName,
-\t\t\t\t$nameOfFunctionToWhichToRemap,
-\t\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t\tscalar( @existingFunctionNames ),
-\t\t\t\tjoin( "\
\\t", @existingFunctionNames )
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t}
-
-\t\t$corresponding_FUNCTION_item = __create_FUNCTION_object(
-\t\t\t$self,
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$nameOfFunctionToWhichToRemap,
-\t\t\t$referenceData,
-\t\t\t$functionItems,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\tmy $typeOfRefObject;
-
-\tif  ( $itemType eq \'MEASUREMENT\' )
-\t{
-\t\t$typeOfRefObject = \'LOC_MEASUREMENT\';
-\t}
-\telsif ( $itemType eq \'CHARACTERISTIC\' || $itemType eq \'AXIS_PTS\' )
-\t{
-\t\t$typeOfRefObject = \'DEF_CHARACTERISTIC\';
-\t}
-\telse
-\t{
-\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] Cannot assign calibratable objects of type %s to FUNCTION items!\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t$itemType
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\tmy @refChildren = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::getChildrenOfThisType(
-\t\t$corresponding_FUNCTION_item,
-\t\t$typeOfRefObject,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-\tassert( ! @refChildren || @refChildren == 1 );
-
-\tmy $refObject;
-
-\tif ( @refChildren )
-\t{
-\t\t$refObject = $refChildren[ 0 ];
-\t}
-\telse
-\t{
-\t\tmy %DEF_CHARACTERISTIC_or_LOC_MEASUREMENT = (
-\t\t\t\'type\'   => $typeOfRefObject,
-\t\t\t\'name\'   => undef,
-
-\t\t\t## @todo Do away with the need to give unnamed items an explicit item id!
-\t\t\t\'itemId\' => "doesn\'t really matter anyway",
-
-\t\t\t\'parsed\' => TRUE,
-\t\t\t\'data\'   => {
-\t\t\t\t\'fixedPositionFields\' => { \'Identifier\' => [] },
-\t\t\t\t\'variablePositionFields\' => {}
-\t\t\t},
-\t\t\t\'children\' => []
-\t\t);
-
-\t\tA2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::addChildItem(
-\t\t\t$corresponding_FUNCTION_item,
-\t\t\t\\%DEF_CHARACTERISTIC_or_LOC_MEASUREMENT,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-
-\t\t$refObject = \\%DEF_CHARACTERISTIC_or_LOC_MEASUREMENT;
-\t}
-
-\tmy $fixedPosFieldsOfRefObject = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::getFixedPositionFields(
-\t\t$refObject,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy $listOfReferencedItems = $$fixedPosFieldsOfRefObject{ \'Identifier\' };
-\tmy %referencedItemsAsDict = map { $_ => undef } @$listOfReferencedItems;
-
-\tif ( exists( $referencedItemsAsDict{ $itemName } ) )
-\t{
-\t\t# Calibratable object is already mentioned here.
-\t\t$dbgLogger->printf(
-\t\t\t\'FUNCTION %s already references %s %s via %s %s (project %s / module %s).\',
-\t\t\t$nameOfFunctionToWhichToRemap,
-\t\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t\t$itemName,
-\t\t\t$$refObject{ \'type\' },
-\t\t\tA2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::determineItemKey( $refObject, $dbgLogger ),
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName
-\t\t);
-\t}
-\telse
-\t{
-\t\tpush( @$listOfReferencedItems, $itemName );
-\t}
-
-\t__removeCalibratableItemFromAllFunctionRefObjects(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t$itemName,
-\t\t$functionItems, # <- from all these
-\t\t$refObject, # <- except from this one
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\t$dbgLogger->printf(
-\t\t\'%s %s re-assigned to FUNCTION %s (project %s / module %s).\',
-\t\t$itemType,
-\t\t$itemName,
-\t\t$nameOfFunctionToWhichToRemap,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName
-\t);
-}
-
-sub __create_FUNCTION_object($$$$$$$)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$nameOfFunctionToCreate,
-\t\t$referenceData,
-\t\t$functionItems,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\t# Create a new FUNCTION item and add it to the MODULE node\'s list of child nodes. Also add the
-\t# new FUNCTION to our meta data dict.
-\tmy %new_FUNCTION = (
-\t\t\'type\'     => \'FUNCTION\',
-\t\t\'name\'     => $nameOfFunctionToCreate,
-\t\t\'parsed\'   => TRUE,
-\t\t\'data\'     => {
-\t\t\t\'fixedPositionFields\' => { \'LongIdentifier\' => \'\' },
-\t\t\t\'variablePositionFields\' => {}
-\t\t},
-\t\t\'children\' => []
-\t);
-
-\tmy $metaDataTypeDictForModule = $$referenceData{ \'metaDataTypeDictForModule\' };
-
-\tmy $functionMetaData = $$metaDataTypeDictForModule{ \'FUNCTION\' };
-
-\tif ( ! defined( $functionMetaData ) )
-\t{
-\t\t$functionMetaData = $$metaDataTypeDictForModule{ \'FUNCTION\' } = {};
-\t}
-
-\tmy $moduleNode = getModuleNode( $self, $projectName, $moduleName, $dbgLogger );
-
-\tif ( exists( $$functionMetaData{ $nameOfFunctionToCreate } ) )
-\t{
-\t\tmy @sortedFunctionItemKeys = sort( keys( %$functionItems ) );
-\t\tmy @sortedFunctionMetaDataKeys = sort( keys( %$functionMetaData ) );
-
-\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] Internal logic error! FUNCTION item %s exists in function object " .
-\t\t\t\t"meta data dictionary, but getItemsInNamespace() did not return a valid " .
-\t\t\t\t"entry for this function! Content of %%functionItems (%u entries):\
\
\\t" .
-\t\t\t\t"%s\
\
Content of %%\\$functionMetaData (%u entries):\
\
\\t%s\
\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t$nameOfFunctionToCreate,
-
-\t\t\tscalar( @sortedFunctionItemKeys ),
-\t\t\tjoin(
-\t\t\t\t"\
\\t",
-\t\t\t\tmap {
-\t\t\t\t\tsprintf(
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\'%s -> %s\',
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$_,
-\t\t\t\t\t\tdefined( $$functionItems{ $_ } ) ? \'<FUNCTION item>\'
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t: \'<undef>\'
-\t\t\t\t\t)
-\t\t\t\t} @sortedFunctionItemKeys
-\t\t\t),
-
-\t\t\tscalar( @sortedFunctionMetaDataKeys ),
-\t\t\tjoin(
-\t\t\t\t"\
\\t",
-\t\t\t\tmap {
-\t\t\t\t\tsprintf(
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\'%s -> %s\',
-\t\t\t\t\t\t$_,
-\t\t\t\t\t\tdefined( $$functionMetaData{ $_ } ) ? \'<FUNCTION item>\'
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t: \'<undef>\'
-\t\t\t\t\t)
-\t\t\t\t} @sortedFunctionMetaDataKeys
-\t\t\t)
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\t$$functionMetaData{ $nameOfFunctionToCreate } = {
-\t\t\'element\'       => \\%new_FUNCTION,
-\t\t\'depth\'         => 3,
-\t\t\'parentElement\' => $moduleNode
-\t};
-
-\t$$functionItems{ $nameOfFunctionToCreate } = \\%new_FUNCTION;
-
-\tA2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::addChildItem( $moduleNode, \\%new_FUNCTION, $dbgLogger );
-
-\treturn \\%new_FUNCTION;
-}
-
-sub __removeCalibratableItemFromAllFunctionRefObjects($$$$$$)
-{
-\tmy (
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$typeOfCalibratableItem,
-\t\t$nameOfCalibratableItem,
-\t\t$fromTheseFunctionItems,
-\t\t$exceptFromThisRefObject,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t) = @_;
-
-\tmy @refObjectTypesToCheck = ();
-
-\tif ( $typeOfCalibratableItem eq \'MEASUREMENT\' )
-\t{
-\t\tpush( @refObjectTypesToCheck, \'LOC_MEASUREMENT\' );
-\t\t#push( @refObjectTypesToCheck, \'IN_MEASUREMENT\' );
-\t\t#push( @refObjectTypesToCheck, \'OUT_MEASUREMENT\' );
-\t}
-\telse
-\t{
-\t\tassert( $typeOfCalibratableItem eq \'CHARACTERISTIC\' || $typeOfCalibratableItem eq \'AXIS_PTS\' );
-\t\tpush( @refObjectTypesToCheck, \'DEF_CHARACTERISTIC\', \'REF_CHARACTERISTIC\' );
-\t}
-
-\tforeach my $functionName ( keys( %$fromTheseFunctionItems ) )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $functionItem = $$fromTheseFunctionItems{ $functionName };
-
-\t\tforeach my $refObjectType ( @refObjectTypesToCheck )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tmy @refChildren = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::getChildrenOfThisType(
-\t\t\t\t$functionItem,
-\t\t\t\t$refObjectType,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\tforeach my $refChildItem ( @refChildren )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\tif ( defined( $exceptFromThisRefObject ) && $exceptFromThisRefObject == $refChildItem )
-\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t\tmy $fixedPosFieldsOfRefObject = A2L_Lib2::ItemFuncs::getFixedPositionFields(
-\t\t\t\t\t$refChildItem,
-\t\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\t\tmy $listOfReferencedItems = $$fixedPosFieldsOfRefObject{ \'Identifier\' };
-\t\t\t\tmy %referencedItemsAsDict = map { $_ => undef } @$listOfReferencedItems;
-
-\t\t\t\tif ( ! exists( $referencedItemsAsDict{ $nameOfCalibratableItem } ) )
-\t\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t\t# Calibratable object not mentioned in this item\'s list of references.
-\t\t\t\t\t# Nothing to do.
-\t\t\t\t\tnext;
-\t\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\t\tdelete $referencedItemsAsDict{ $nameOfCalibratableItem };
-\t\t\t\t@$listOfReferencedItems = keys( %referencedItemsAsDict );
-\t\t\t}
-\t\t}
-\t}
-}
-
-# Convenience method that returns not just what __getItemReferencesInThisModule returns but also
-# all objects involved in obtaining that information.
-sub __getItemReferencesInThisModule_wrapper($$$$$)
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $projectName, $moduleName, $forceRefresh, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\tmy $itemTypePluginManager = getItemTypePluginManager( $self, $dbgLogger );
-\tassert( defined( $itemTypePluginManager ) );

-\t\t$itemTypesThatAreReferenceable,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems
-\t) = $itemTypePluginManager->getItemTypeReferenceRelationships( $dbgLogger );
-
-\tmy %nullReferenceKeywordsTable = NULL_REFERENCE_KEYWORDS;
-
-\tmy $instanceOptions = $$self{ \'options\' };
-\tassert( defined( $instanceOptions ) );
-
-\tmy %predefinedDataTypeLookupTable = A2L_Lib2::PredefinedDataTypes::makePredefinedDataTypeLookupTable(
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\tA2L_Lib2::Util::getLenientOptionsDict( $dbgLogger, %$instanceOptions )
-\t);
-
-\tmy $metaDataTypeDictForModule = __getMetaDataCacheForType(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\tundef,
-\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t);
-
-\tmy %variablePositionFieldsLookupTable = A2L_Lib2::VariablePositionFields::VARIABLE_POSITION_FIELDS_LOOKUP_TABLE;
-
-\tmy $itemRefsInThisModule = __getItemReferencesInThisModule(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t$metaDataTypeDictForModule,
-\t\t$itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,

-\t\t\\%predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,

-\t\t\'predefinedDataTypeLookupTable\'     => \\%predefinedDataTypeLookupTable,
-\t\t\'nullReferenceKeywordsTable\'        => \\%nullReferenceKeywordsTable,
-\t\t\'metaDataTypeDictForModule\'         => $metaDataTypeDictForModule,
-\t\t\'itemTypesThatAreReferenceable\'     => $itemTypesThatAreReferenceable,
-\t\t\'itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems\'    => $itemTypesThatMayReferenceItems,
-\t);
-}
-
-# Returns a reference to the specified MODULE node of the A2L document tree.
-sub getModuleNode($$$$)
-{
-\tmy ( $self, $projectName, $moduleName, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\tmy $requestedModuleNode;
-
-\t__walkDocumentForTheseProjectModuleCombos(
-\t\t$self,
-\t\tsub {
-\t\t\tmy (
-\t\t\t\t$currentProjectName,
-\t\t\t\t$currentModuleName,
-\t\t\t\t$element,
-\t\t\t\t$parentOfCurrentElement,
-\t\t\t\t$currentDepth,
-\t\t\t\t$indexOfCurrentNodeInItsParentNodesChildList,
-\t\t\t\t$isLeafNode,
-\t\t\t\t$dbgLogger_
-\t\t\t) = @_;
-
-\t\t\tmy $elementType = $$element{ \'type\' };
-\t\t\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $elementType ) );
-
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger_->printf(
-\t\t\t\t\'$currentProjectName: "%s", $currentModuleName: "%s", $elementType: "%s"\',
-\t\t\t\t$currentProjectName,
-\t\t\t\t$currentModuleName,
-\t\t\t\t$elementType
-\t\t\t);
-
-\t\t\tif ( $elementType eq \'MODULE\' && $currentProjectName eq $projectName &&
-\t\t\t\t$currentModuleName eq $moduleName )
-\t\t\t{
-\t\t\t\t$requestedModuleNode = $element;
-\t\t\t\treturn ( FALSE, FALSE, FALSE );
-\t\t\t}
-
-\t\t\treturn ( TRUE, FALSE, FALSE );
-\t\t},
-\t\tundef,
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t( $projectName => { $moduleName => TRUE() } )
-\t);
-
-\tif ( ! defined( $requestedModuleNode ) )
-\t{
-\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] Could not find a MODULE node matching project %s / module %s in %s!\
",
-\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t$projectName,
-\t\t\t$moduleName,
-\t\t\t$$self{ \'originalDocType\' }
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\treturn $requestedModuleNode;
-}
-

-package Parse_DEM_header;

-use strict;

-
-sub __parseSymbolicIdToNumericIdMapFromHeader($$$)
-{
-\tmy ( $headerFile, $entriesHash, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\tmy @lines = FileUtil::readTextFile( $headerFile, $dbgLogger, \'trim\' => TRUE );
-
-\tforeach my $line ( @lines )
-\t{
-\t\t## @todo This a fragile approach to extracting these definitions. One of its weaknesses is
-\t\t## that if any header file uses a backslash to split a macro definition over multiple lines,
-\t\t## this regex won\'t catch that.
-\t\tif ( $line =~ m/#define\\s+DemConf_DemEventParameter_(\\S+)\\s+(\\d+)/ )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t$$entriesHash{ $1 } = int( $2 );
-\t\t}
-\t}
-}
-
-sub getSymbolicIdToNumericIdMap($@)
-{
-\tmy ( $dbgLogger, @headerFilesToParse ) = @_;
-
-\tmy %symbolicIdToNumericIdMap = ();
-
-\tforeach my $headerFile ( @headerFilesToParse )
-\t{
-\t\t__parseSymbolicIdToNumericIdMapFromHeader(
-\t\t\t$headerFile,
-\t\t\t\\%symbolicIdToNumericIdMap,
-\t\t\t$dbgLogger
-\t\t);
-\t}
-
-\t$dbgLogger->printf(
-\t\t\'Extracted %u symbolic-ID-to-numeric-ID mappings fom %u header files.\',
-\t\tscalar( keys( %symbolicIdToNumericIdMap ) ),
-\t\tscalar( @headerFilesToParse )
-\t);
-
-\treturn %symbolicIdToNumericIdMap;
-}
-
-sub getNumericIdToSymbolicIdMap($%)
-{
-\tmy ( $dbgLogger, %symbolicIdToNumericIdMap ) = @_;
-
-\tmy %numericIdToSymbolicIdMap = ();
-
-\tforeach my $symbolicId ( keys( %symbolicIdToNumericIdMap ) )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $correspondingNumericId = $symbolicIdToNumericIdMap{ $symbolicId };
-\t\tassert( defined( $correspondingNumericId ) );
-
-\t\tmy $symbolsMappedToThisNumericId = $numericIdToSymbolicIdMap{ $correspondingNumericId };
-
-\t\tif ( ! defined( $symbolsMappedToThisNumericId ) )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t$symbolsMappedToThisNumericId = $numericIdToSymbolicIdMap{ $correspondingNumericId } = {};
-\t\t}
-
-\t\t$$symbolsMappedToThisNumericId{ $symbolicId } = undef;
-\t}
-
-\tforeach my $numericId ( sort { $a <=> $b } keys( %numericIdToSymbolicIdMap ) )
-\t{
-\t\tmy $symbolsMappedToThisNumericId = $numericIdToSymbolicIdMap{ $numericId };
-
-\t\tmy @symbolicIDs = sort( keys( %$symbolsMappedToThisNumericId ) );
-\t\tassert( @symbolicIDs );
-
-\t\t# Verify that no 2 symbolic IDs map to the same numeric ID! Otherwise the result is undefined!
-\t\tif ( @symbolicIDs > 1 )
-\t\t{
-\t\t\tdie printf(
-\t\t\t\t"ERROR: [%s] %u symbolic DEM IDs are mapped to numeric DEM ID %u:\
\
\\t%s\
\
" .
-\t\t\t\t\t"No unambiguous mapping of symbolic DEM IDs to numeric DEM IDs possible!\
",
-\t\t\t\tContext::getContext(),
-\t\t\t\tscalar( @symbolicIDs ),
-\t\t\t\t$numericId,
-\t\t\t\tjoin( "\
\\t", @symbolicIDs )
-\t\t\t);
-\t\t}
-
-\t\t$numericIdToSymbolicIdMap{ $numericId } = $symbolicIDs[ 0 ];
-\t}
-
-\t$dbgLogger->print( sub {
-
-\t\t# Print numeric IDs in correct order.
-\t\tlocal( $Data::Dumper::Sortkeys ) = sub {
-\t\t\tmy ( $dictRef ) = @_;
-\t\t\treturn [ sort { $a <=> $b } keys( %$dictRef ) ];
-\t\t};
-
-\t\treturn sprintf(
-\t\t\t"Dump of %%numericIdToSymbolicIdMap:\
\
%s\
\
",
-\t\t\tData::Dumper::Dumper( \\%numericIdToSymbolicIdMap )
-\t\t);
-\t} );
-
-\treturn %numericIdToSymbolicIdMap;
-}
-
-1;

-use strict;
-use warnings FATAL => \'all\';
-
-# standard Perl library imports
-use Carp::Always;
-use Carp::Assert;
-use File::Basename;
-use Getopt::Long;
-
-# tools/cm imports
-use A2L_Lib2::BasicDefs;
-use Common;
-use DebugLogger;
-use FileUtil;
-use StringFuncs;
-
-use constant FALSE => 0;
-use constant TRUE => ! FALSE;
-
-sub getUsageString()
-{
-\treturn "\
\
" .
-\t\t"Description:\
\
" .
-\t\t"\\t" . "This script does ... things. Important things, presumably. If you ever find out what exactly those things\
" .
-\t\t"\\t" . "are, please contact me and let me know. I tried reverse engineering / refactoring this mess, but to no avail.\
\
" .
-\t\t"Usage:\
\
" .
-\t\t"\\t" . \'perl \' . File::Basename::basename( $0 ) . " <inputFile> <outputFile> [--debug[=modules]] [--help]\
\
" .
-\t\t"\\t" . "positional (mandatory) args:\
" .
-\t\t"\\t\\t" . "inputFile                                   Path of the inputFile A2L file.\
" .
-\t\t"\\t\\t" . "outputFile                                  Path of the output A2L file.\
\
" .
-\t\t"\\t" . "optional args:\
" .
-\t\t"\\t\\t" . "--debug                                     If specified, print additional debug output to stdout.\
" .
-\t\t"\\t\\t" . "--help                                      Print help screen and exit.\
\
" .
-\t\t"Exit codes:\
\
" .
-\t\t"\\t" . "0  :      No problems were encountered.\
" .
-\t\t"\\t" . "<>0:      At least one error occurred.\
\
\
\
";
-}
-
-sub __adapt_DEM_A2L($$$)
-{
-\tmy ( $inputFile, $outputFile, $dbgLogger ) = @_;
-
-\t$dbgLogger->printf( \'Input file = "%s", output file = "%s".\', $inputFile, $outputFile );
-
-\tmy @original_A2L = FileUtil::readTextFile( $inputFile, $dbgLogger );
-
-\tmy $currently_in_a_block = FALSE;
-\tmy $skip_next_line = FALSE;
-\tmy $skip_this_line = 0;
-\tmy $section_start = 0;
-\tmy $header = TRUE;
-\tmy $footer = FALSE;
-\tmy $eventPrimaryFlag = FALSE;
-
-\tmy @finalLines = ();
-
-\t## @todo Though I still don\'t fully understand this terrible code, it apparently does something
-\t## that is, at least for now, actually necessary. In the automatically generated AUTOSAR A2L
-\t## files (in some projects only) there are some type definitions that assign strings to
-\t## character arrays that are actually too small to accomodate said strings. Somehow, this
-\t## script shortens these strings to fit into the arrays.
-\t## The reason for this discrepancy is almost certainly a misconfiguration by BSW, but for now
-\t## that\'s how it is. >8^(
-\tforeach my $line ( @original_A2L )
-\t{
-\t\t## @todo What the heck are \'lovas\'??
-\t\t# my $lovas = 0;
-\t\t
-\t\t
-\t\t# replace indexer format
-\t\t$line =~ s/\\[(\\d*)\\]/._$1_/g;
-
-\t\tif($eventPrimaryFlag == TRUE)
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t$line =~ s/NO_COMPU_METHOD/EventIdToName/g;
-\t\t\t$eventPrimaryFlag = FALSE;
-\t\t}
-\t\telsif($line =~ /MEASUREMENT Dem_Cfg_PrimaryEntry_(\\d*).EventId/)
-\t\t{
-\t\t\t$eventPrimaryFlag = TRUE;
-\t\t}
-\t\t
-\t\t
-
-\t\t# if ( $skip_next_line )
-\t\t# {
-\t\t\t# $skip_next_line = FALSE;
-\t\t\t# next;
-\t\t# }
-
-\t\t# # ignore all the lines until the first "/begin CHARACTERISTIC..."
-\t\t# if ( $header && $line !~ m/begin CHARACTERISTIC/ )
-\t\t# {
-\t\t\t# next;
-\t\t# }
-\t\t# else
-\t\t# {
-\t\t\t# $header = FALSE;
-\t\t# }
-
-\t\t# # ignore everything from "/end MODULE"
-\t\t# if ( $footer || $line =~ m/end MODULE/ )
-\t\t# {
-\t\t\t# $footer = TRUE;
-\t\t\t# next;
-\t\t# }
-
-\t\t# if ( $currently_in_a_block )
-\t\t# {
-\t\t\t# # determine the length of the line
-\t\t\t# my $str_len = length( $line );
-
-\t\t\t# # this is the after comment char number
-\t\t\t# my $num = 0;
-
-\t\t\t# # go through the whole row chars
-\t\t\t# for ( my $x = 0; $x < $str_len; ++$x )
-\t\t\t# {
-\t\t\t\t# # if there is a " character, starting the section
-\t\t\t\t# if ( substr( $line, $x, 1 ) eq \'"\' )
-\t\t\t\t# {
-\t\t\t\t\t# ++$section_start;
-
-\t\t\t\t\t# if ( $section_start > 1 )
-\t\t\t\t\t# {
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# ++$skip_this_line;
-\t\t\t\t\t# }
-
-\t\t\t\t\t# ++$lovas;
-\t\t\t\t\t# next;
-\t\t\t\t# }
-
-\t\t\t\t# if ( $section_start == 1 )
-\t\t\t\t# {
-\t\t\t\t\t# ++$num;
-
-\t\t\t\t\t# # if there is a end comment char
-\t\t\t\t\t# if ( substr( $line, $x, 1 ) eq \'"\' )
-\t\t\t\t\t# {
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# $section_start = 100;
-\t\t\t\t\t# }
-\t\t\t\t\t# elsif ( $num == 253 || substr( $line, $x, 1 ) eq "\
" )
-\t\t\t\t\t# {
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# # leave the row, yell it and generate a new row with closer char and write out
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# #printf( "section size = %d ended by 254 \
", $num );
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# my $temp = substr( $line, ( $x - $num ), $num ) . "\\"\
";
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# ++$lovas;
-
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# # but must investigate that there is a closer char. If yes, just leave it alone the loop.
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# while ( TRUE )
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# {
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# if ( substr( $line, $x, 1 ) eq \'"\' )
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# {
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# $dbgLogger->printf( \'#1: $line changed to "%s" (from "%s").\', $temp, $line );
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# $line = $temp;
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# $str_len = length( $line );
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# $section_start = 200;
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# last;
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# }
-
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# ++$x;
-
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# if ( $x == $str_len )
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# {
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# ++$skip_this_line;
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# $dbgLogger->printf( \'#2: $line changed to "%s" (from "%s").\', $temp, $line );
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# $line = $temp;
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# $str_len = length( $line );
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# last;
-\t\t\t\t\t\t\t# }
-\t\t\t\t\t\t# }
-\t\t\t\t\t# }
-\t\t\t\t# }
-\t\t\t# }
-
-\t\t\t# # look for missing " due to unwanted line break
-\t\t\t# if ( $lovas % 2 != 0 && 2 > $section_start )
-\t\t\t# {
-\t\t\t\t# my $temp = substr( $line, ( $str_len - 1 - $num ), $num ) . "\\"\
";
-
-\t\t\t\t# $skip_next_line = TRUE;
-\t\t\t\t# $dbgLogger->printf( \'#3: $line changed to "%s" (from "%s").\', $temp, $line );
-\t\t\t\t# $line = $temp;
-\t\t\t\t# $str_len = length( $line );
-\t\t\t# }
-\t\t# }
-
-\t\t# if ( $line =~ m/begin/ )
-\t\t# {
-\t\t\t# $currently_in_a_block = TRUE;
-\t\t# }
-
-\t\t# if ( $line =~ m/\\/end\\s+/ )
-\t\t# {
-\t\t\t# $currently_in_a_block = FALSE;
-\t\t\t# $section_start = 0;
-\t\t\t# $skip_this_line = 0;
-\t\t# }
-
-\t\t# if ( $skip_this_line > 1 && $section_start < 3 )
-\t\t# {
-\t\t\t# $skip_this_line = 1;
-\t\t\t# next;
-\t\t# }
-
-\t\tpush( @finalLines, $line );
-\t}
-
-\tFileUtil::writeTextFile(
-\t\t$outputFile,
-\t\t\\@finalLines,
-\t\t$dbgLogger,
-\t\t\'encoding\' => A2L_Lib2::BasicDefs::DEFAULT_A2L_FILE_ENCODING
-\t);
-}
-
-sub __impl($)
-{
-\tmy ( $refToScriptArgsArray ) = @_;
-
-\t# Extract keyword args (optional) first because GetOptions() will remove any options it
-\t# recognizes from the command line.
-\tmy $debug;
-\tmy $help = \'\';
-
-\tGetopt::Long::GetOptionsFromArray(
-\t\t$refToScriptArgsArray,
-\t\t\'debug:s\' => \\$debug,
-\t\t\'help\'    => \\$help
-\t) or Common::exitWithMessage( 1, getUsageString() );
-
-\tif ( $help )
-\t{
-\t\tCommon::exitWithMessage( 0, getUsageString() );
-\t}
-
-\tif ( @$refToScriptArgsArray != 2 )
-\t{
-\t\tCommon::exitWithMessage( 1, getUsageString() );
-\t}
-
-\tmy $dbgLogger = DebugLogger::createFromCommandLineArg( $debug );
-
-\tmy ( $inputFile, $outputFile ) = @$refToScriptArgsArray;
-
-\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $inputFile ) );
-\tassert( ! StringFuncs::null( $outputFile ) );
-
-\t__adapt_DEM_A2L( $inputFile, $outputFile, $dbgLogger );
-
-\treturn 0;
-}
-
-sub main($)
-{
-\tmy ( $refToScriptArgsArray ) = @_;
-
-\teval {
-\t\t__impl( $refToScriptArgsArray );
-\t\t1;
-\t} or do {
-\t\tdie sprintf(
-\t\t\t"ERROR: <%s> Something went wrong:\
\
%s\
\
",
-\t\t\tFileUtil::simplifyPath( __FILE__ ),
-\t\t\t$@
-\t\t);
-\t};
-
-\treturn 0;
-}
-
-exit( main( [ @ARGV ] ) );

-# Most AutoCore plugin makefiles add their preprocessor flags to the PREPROCESSOR_DEFINES list.
-# This function converts the thus configured values to keys and values that can be passed to the C
-# preprocessor.
-getAutoCorePluginsPreprocessorDefines = $(foreach DEF,$(PREPROCESSOR_DEFINES),\\
-\t-D$($(DEF)_KEY)=$($(DEF)_VALUE) \\
-)
-
-#Patched for including vector components
-VECTOR_AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_COREPATH := $(foreach PLUGIN, $(VECTOR_PROJECT_MODULES), $($(PLUGIN)_CORE_PATH))
-VECTOR_AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_COREPATH := $(sort $(subst \\,/,$(VECTOR_AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_COREPATH)))
-VECTOR_AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_COREPATH := $(foreach DIR, $(VECTOR_AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_COREPATH), $(addsuffix /make, $(DIR)))
-PROJECT_OUTPUT_PATH      := $(AUTOSAR_GENERATED_DIR)
-AUTOSAR_BASE_OUTPUT_PATH := $(AUTOSAR_GENERATED_DIR)
-PROJECT_MODULES_FILTERED := $(PROJECT_MODULES)
-
-ASM_FILE_SUFFIX := s
-CC_FILE_SUFFIX  := c
-
-# We do not want to pull in any makefiles provided by the Make_* plugin, because they would overwrite
-# many of the rules / definitions provided by our own build tooling.
-PROJECT_MODULES_FILTERED := $(filter-out Make, $(PROJECT_MODULES_FILTERED))
-
-# Concatenate module names (e.g. CRC) and TS-Strings (e.g. TS_TxDxM5I1R0) to a single string (e.g. CRC_TS_TxDxM5I1R0).
-FULL_TS_STRINGS := $(foreach PLUGIN, $(PROJECT_MODULES_FILTERED), $(PLUGIN)_$($(PLUGIN)_VARIANT))
-
-# Concatenate FULL_TS_STRINGS (e.g. CRC_TS_TxDxM5I1R0) and AUTOCORE_PLUGINS_PATH (e.g. S:\\Customer_PRJ\\eclipse\\plugins)
-# to S:\\Customer_PRJ\\eclipse\\plugins\\CRC_TS_TxDxM5I1R0.
-AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_DIRS := $(foreach DIR, $(FULL_TS_STRINGS), $(addprefix $(AUTOCORE_PLUGINS_PATH)/, $(DIR)))
-
-# Generate list of make dirs (e.g. S:\\Customer_PRJ\\eclipse\\plugins\\Resource_TS_T2D17M0I9R0\\make).
-AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_MAKE_DIRS := $(foreach DIR, $(AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_DIRS), $(addsuffix /make, $(DIR)))
-AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_MAKE_DIRS := $(sort $(subst \\,/,$(AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_MAKE_DIRS)))
-AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_MAKE_DIRS += $(foreach DIR, $(VECTOR_AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_COREPATH), $(DIR))
-
-TOTAL_AUTO_CORE_PLUGINS := $(words $(AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_MAKE_DIRS))
-INCLUDE_COUNTER := 0
-
-# Now iterate over all our plugins, and for each plugin, include all its makefiles. When including
-# a plugin\'s makefiles, special attention must be paid to including them in the correct order:
-#
-# 1) any _def.mak makefiles
-# 2) any _rule.mak makefiles
-#
-# NOTE: Plugin makefiles are sorted by their base names, to ensure stable include order. Not
-# strictly necessary, but it probably helps to rule out sporadic and hard to catch issues.
-$(foreach THIS_AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_MAKEFILE_DIR, $(AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_MAKE_DIRS), \\
-\t$(eval INCLUDE_COUNTER := $(call plus,$(INCLUDE_COUNTER),1)) \\
-\t$(eval THIS_PLUGIN_DIR := $(call removeTrailingPathSep, $(dir $(THIS_AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_MAKEFILE_DIR)))) \\
-\t$(eval THIS_PLUGIN_NAME := $(notdir $(THIS_PLUGIN_DIR))) \\
-\t$(eval MAKEFILES_FOR_THIS_PLUGIN := $(strip $(wildcard $(THIS_AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_MAKEFILE_DIR)/*.mak))) \\
-\t$(eval MAKEFILES_FOR_THIS_PLUGIN := $(sort $(subst \\,/,$(MAKEFILES_FOR_THIS_PLUGIN)))) \\
-\t$(eval DEF_MAKEFILES_FOR_THIS_PLUGIN := $(filter %_defs.mak, $(MAKEFILES_FOR_THIS_PLUGIN))) \\
-\t$(eval RULE_MAKEFILES_FOR_THIS_PLUGIN := $(filter %_rules.mak, $(MAKEFILES_FOR_THIS_PLUGIN))) \\
-\t$(if $(or $(DEF_MAKEFILES_FOR_THIS_PLUGIN),$(RULE_MAKEFILES_FOR_THIS_PLUGIN)), \\
-\t\t$(call includeModuleMakefiles,$(DEF_MAKEFILES_FOR_THIS_PLUGIN) $(RULE_MAKEFILES_FOR_THIS_PLUGIN),AutoCore-plugin $(INCLUDE_COUNTER)/$(TOTAL_AUTO_CORE_PLUGINS): $(THIS_PLUGIN_NAME),$(IS_FIRST_MAKE_EVALUATION)) \\
-\t, \\
-\t\t$(call verbosePrint_1,$(TARGET_BUILD_MESSAGE_PREFIX) No (_defs.mak|_rules.mak) files found in AutoCore-plugin $(INCLUDE_COUNTER)/$(TOTAL_AUTO_CORE_PLUGINS) "$(THIS_PLUGIN_NAME)".) \\
-\t\t$(call verbosePrint_1,$(INFO_NEWLINE)) \\
-\t) \\
-\t$(eval undefine MAKEFILES_FOR_THIS_PLUGIN) \\
-\t$(eval undefine DEF_MAKEFILES_FOR_THIS_PLUGIN) \\
-\t$(eval undefine RULE_MAKEFILES_FOR_THIS_PLUGIN) \\
-\t$(eval undefine THIS_PLUGIN_DIR) \\
-\t$(eval undefine THIS_PLUGIN_NAME) \\
-)
-
-# Undefine locally used temporary variables.
-undefine PROJECT_MODULES_FILTERED
-undefine AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_DIRS
-undefine AUTOCORE_PLUGIN_MAKE_DIRS
-undefine TOTAL_AUTO_CORE_PLUGINS
-undefine INCLUDE_COUNTER
-undefine FULL_TS_STRINGS

-# these be included first.

-# variable.

-<!-- Manually maintained signature info file. During the build, the signature information hard-coded here is merged with the
-signature information obtained dynamically from the linked list of admin tables to produce the final signatureInfo.xml file.
-This is all part of a long-standing and time-honored tradition in the Valeo-Siemens company, where we generally prefer horrible
-hacks over properly planned and implemented features. -->
-
-<SignatureInfo>
-\t<!-- This is the outer CPLD signature. It encompasses both the CPLD image payload data and the CPLD\'s admin table block. Note that, since the
-\tsignature patcher exe uses the block id part of the name as keys into a dictionary, we cannot presently have multiple signatures whose block id part
-\tin the name field is identical, so we\'re using CPLD_BLOCKID_OUTER instead of CPLD_BLOCKID for this one. -->
-\t<Signature destAddr="0x79AF0" destWidth="384" name="CPLD_OUTER_BLOCKID" signAlgorithm="SIG_CALC_RSA3072" digestAlgorithm="DIGEST_CALC_SHA2_256">
-\t\t<Certificates>
-\t\t\t<Certificate destAddr="0x79C70" destWidth="912"/>
-\t\t</Certificates>
-\t\t<DigestRanges>
-\t\t\t<DigestRange start="0x60000" end="0x79AEF"/>
-\t\t\t<DigestRange start="0x7A000" end="0x7DDFF"/>
-\t\t</DigestRanges>
-\t</Signature>
-
-\t<!-- This is the outer ADIS signature. It encompasses both the ADIS image payload data and the ADIS\'s admin table block. Note that, since the
-\tsignature patcher exe uses the block id part of the name as keys into a dictionary, we cannot presently have multiple signatures whose block id part
-\tin the name field is identical, so we\'re using EXT_UC_BLOCKID_OUTER instead of EXT_UC_BLOCKID for this one. -->
-\t<Signature destAddr="0x31AF0" destWidth="384" name="EXT_UC_OUTER_BLOCKID" signAlgorithm="SIG_CALC_RSA3072" digestAlgorithm="DIGEST_CALC_SHA2_256">
-\t\t<Certificates>
-\t\t\t<Certificate destAddr="0x31C70" destWidth="912"/>
-\t\t</Certificates>
-\t\t<DigestRanges>
-\t\t\t<DigestRange start="0x20000" end="0x31AEF"/>
-\t\t\t<DigestRange start="0x32000" end="0x35DFF"/>
-\t\t</DigestRanges>
-\t</Signature>
-
-\t<Signature destAddr="0x000408F0" destWidth="384" digestAlgorithm="DIGEST_CALC_SHA2_256" name="DGP_BLOCKID" signAlgorithm="SIG_CALC_RSA3072">
-\t\t<Certificates>
-\t\t\t<Certificate destAddr="0x00040A70" destWidth="912"/>
-\t\t</Certificates>
-\t\t<DigestRanges>
-\t\t\t<DigestRange start="0x00040000" end="0x000408EF"/>
-\t\t</DigestRanges>
-\t</Signature>
-
-\t<Signature destAddr="0x8037F8f0" destWidth="384" digestAlgorithm="DIGEST_CALC_SHA2_256" name="CBU_BLOCKID" signAlgorithm="SIG_CALC_RSA3072">
-\t\t<Certificates>
-\t\t\t<Certificate destAddr="0x8037FA70" destWidth="912"/>
-\t\t</Certificates>
-\t\t<DigestRanges>
-\t\t\t<DigestRange start="0x80340000" end="0x8037F8EF"/>
-\t\t</DigestRanges>
-\t</Signature>
-
-</SignatureInfo>

-"c:\\Program Files\\7-Zip\\7z.exe" u -r -mx1 archive.zip Components\\*.c

-:x86
